Pad up and partner up! From the creators of the most popular cricket game in the world, Stick Cricket Partnerships offers you the chance to: BAT WITH YOUR FRIENDS Head out into the middle with your mates, working together to complete each level. Whether chasing a big target, smashing sixes or surviving against spin, teamwork is essential. BAT WITH THE ALL STARS Partner with some of the greats of the game. Choose carefully: a stand with a Slogger may end prematurely, while batting alongside an Accumulator may send you - and the crowd - to sleep. REVIEW UMPIRING DECISIONS Extend your stay at the crease with the help of the DRS (Dodgy Review System). EARN REWARDS Pocket cash bonuses to spend on upgrading your bat, unlocking more All Star Partners or stocking up on Dodgy Referrals. --- Easy to play yet hard to master, Stick Cricket Partnerships boasts the same “hellishly addictive” (Gizmodo) gameplay that helped Stick Cricket to become a productivity-destroying phenomenon worldwide. Whether batting with a friend (Facebook or Stick Sports account required) or forging a one-day stand with a random, Partnerships is the ultimate test of teamwork. By downloading this app you are accepting our EULA: http://www.sticksports.com/mobile/terms.php Important message: This game includes in-app purchases.
release_text: BUG FIXES: We’ve resolved an issue with Facebook Login. Meanwhile, Alastair Cook’s application to be an All Star Partner has been refused. Chris Martin retains his place instead.

description: Easily the #1 memory game for Android. Find the matching tiles in this highly polished little Pixel-Art Memory game! When you match the tiles and win the game, you earn Pixel points, that can be used to unlock even more tiles to play with. It's great fun for the kids! Not only that, but it's kinda educational too; it trains kids memory (and yours). Sounds like fun to me! All permissions are used for the in-game ads.
release_text: - There's now a 'New' button, to jump right to the next puzzle! - Changed ads system

description: Save money! Get 3 times as much detective fun! Every place has its secrets - be that a mysterious house, an old factory or a strange island! This wonderful hidden object game bundle gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing life-like items in 3 games: HOUSE SECRETS, DETECTIVE MYSTERIES and DETECTIVE QUEST! What we give you, are three difficulty levels: - CASUAL - No time limit and quick hint. All modes available for each unlocked level! - NORMAL - Time limit and slower hint. Each use of hint costs 2 seconds. Only those modes you've played in the previous level are available in the next one. - EXPERT - Bonus mode for those who got all stars on all levels in either CASUAL or NORMAL mode. Each scene can be completed in three search modes: - By PICTURE - By WORD - By SILHOUETTE Complete each of them on each scene to complete a game! Go back to previous levels to get a better score and unlock the next section! Additionally, Detective Mysteries and Detective Quest include a cool STORY MODE! Features: - 3 great games in one bundle - clever fun to solve hidden object scenes - item search by word or by pictures and by silhouette - inspiring artwork in realistic locations - difficulty levels and unlockable content

Butterfly Adventures is a fun arcade style game where you control a beautiful butterfly whose goal is to gather as much pollen from the air as possible. But watch out because not all of the pollen is created equal! Some pollen is polluted. We call this kind of pollen the “Smokers,” and they are bad news. If your butterfly touches a Smoker, you lose a life. Flutter out of the way or hide under flower petals to avoid polluted pollen. There is also special pollen that sparkles. You want to collect all the twinkling pollen you can! This “Super” pollen gives you bonus points and will destroy all Smoker pollen from the screen (giving you an even higher bonus score.) As your butterfly flutters through each wave, the pollen will fall faster so be alert. Keep your eye out for rare Mystery Icons which will drop during the game. Collect these to unlock other species of butterflies. You can watch each butterfly (by visiting your collection) go through their complete metamorphosis as they turn from an egg, to a caterpillar, to a chrysalis, and then eventually into a vibrant and unique butterfly! As your butterflies hatch, you can then select ANY from your collection to play as in the game! Have fun capturing them all for a complete set!! *** Designed for Tablet's but also works on high resolution phones.*** • Two methods of play - normal mode is multi-touch and easy mode is touch and drag • Capture all of the mystery butterfly icons as they fall to complete your butterfly collection • Check in daily to watch your butterfly complete its metamorphosis. Each stage will show you something new and there’s a countdown to show you when your butterfly will reach the next stage! • Learn about different species of butterflies as your collection grows • Switch out butterflies from your collection to play in game! This is a really fun feature and it’s really cool to play as all the different butterflies. You can change as many times as you’d like during game play! •Game saves anytime you go to main menu to check your butterfly collection. You’ll resume game in the same wave you were at before exiting • High scores are saved. Try to beat your top score. This is an arcade game and the whole goal is to collect as many points as you can!!

Emergency Rescuer service ensures public safety by delivering second to none service and by responding to the SOS or 911call in no time. You are in frontline and your duty is very tough when lives are in danger. You have to take control as a frontline rescuer and save innocent lives from the deadly fires at the massive airport. You have to control your nerves and be one of the real firefighting technical staff; they are experts in their field with unique skills and knowledge. Game Features: • Challenging and outstanding environment. • Real passenger jet / airplane landing simulation. • Clock is ticking so transport these racing firefighting trucks on time. • Extreme precision 3D fire trucks and ambulance simulator. • Great dynamic game play. • Excellent sound effects. • Amazing 3D graphics About the simulation game play of “Airport Fire Emergency Rescue”; you will see an airplane crashing that you have to rescue. Then you will have an emergency fire truck ambulance that you have to park in the fire exit of that very airplane. Once you park that in emergency exit then the real task starts. You will have to take an ambulance and park in the hospital parking so that people can be rescued safely. You have to be very quick as you have to save lives. You have to respond to aircraft and airport emergency rescue requests immediately; your primary duty is to save people from an aircraft crash or fire and from other fires on the airport. You have to provide the best of aviation rescue and firefighting services with accuracy and precision. You must be able to respond to an aircraft incident at either end of a runway within given time from the initial start and park your ambulance at the parking spot. Disaster management team has, high performance aviation firefighting vehicles, aerial rescue vehicles, difficult terrain vehicles and domestic response vehicles. This allows them to respond to a broad range of aviation and airport emergencies, including aircraft incidents, structural fires, medical assistance requests, water rescues and fire alarms.

Are you ready to conquer the most extreme courses in the world? Ready to tee off from grand canyons, icebergs or fighter jets - Flick Golf Extreme is the perfect adrenaline fix for your finger! DESCRIPTION Follow-up to the most addictive golf game to blaze its way onto the Android Market Flick Golf, Flick Golf Extreme is incredibly simple to play, just flick the ball and hit the hole. Our trademark spin control, combined with insanely fun gameplay brings you the world’s first truly extreme golf game. There are no rules, no clubs and no laws in Flick Golf Extreme! Play across skyscrapers, an oil rig, aircraft carrier and more in the most insane conditions you’ve ever seen! FEATURES: • Shoot for an insane score in classic Quickshot mode. • Play World Tour across the most extreme courses in the world. • Try out the challenging Five Ball mode! • Gorgeous 3D environments. • See your ball set ablaze with amazing hole-in-one special effects! • Incredibly accurate in-air spin control. • Listen to your own music while you play! CONTACT: HELP: www.fullfat.com/support VISIT: www.fullfat.com SOCIAL: +1: gplus.to/fullfatgames LIKE: facebook.com/fullfatgames FOLLOW: twitter.com/fullfatgames WATCH: youtube.com/fullfatgames

An accurate metronome for your mobile phone. This metronome includes an A440 tuning note ("tuning fork"), and guide circle, so it's easy to select your tempo, from Largo to Prestissimo! New: - Louder metronome audio beat - Free metronome is Ad supported

Crazy Dentist Office - Christmas Game for Kids Creation Lovely Little Dentist Office is opening! Patients are lining up outside the little dentist office to check kids teeth/tooth problems... This is a lovely little dentist game for Christmas special version, and it's a good Christmas game for kids creation Look at these poor buddies! They suffer from different kinds of teeth problems like bad teeth,tooth cavity, dental calculus, .etc... It makes them crazy and painful... Director of the crazy dentist office is looking for a smart doctor who can clean, color and beautify teeth. Are you the best kids doctor? Are you the best animal dentist? Are you the best monster dentist? Are you the Come to check it out! You'll be a cool little dentist! You will be a crazy dentist! *****It's a good dentist Christmas game and dentist kids game, it helps to learn about how to protect teeth! It can also improve the kids creativity! It's a cool and interesting dentist kids game for Christmas! And also a Christmas game for kids creation***** Features: * Featuring 9 lovely characters(animals and human beings) in the lovely little dentist office, including celebrity dentist, they have crazy teeth problems and are waiting for the little dentist and crazy dentist. * Provide abundant teeth cleaning tools, color painting brush and kinds of lovely teeth stickers, make you a little dentist and also crazy dentist. * Nice and clean UI with vivid flash, lots of Christmas elements inside. It's kind of celebrity dentist version. * Featuring picture capturing and rating to let you see your work at the first moment.So dear little dentist, don't forget to take a picture after finishing your work! * Not only a Christmas kids game but also full of sense of education, but also make celebrities and develop habit of protecting teeth/tooth. It teaches you how to be a little dentist and little doctor, make you a good little tooth doctor. It's kind of best dentist kids game and best Christmas game for kids creation! * Lovely Christmas game background and sound, make you feel like you are in a holiday season and Merry Christmas! If you want to spend with you kids together, come to play it! You will like the crazy dentist office, it will be the best Christmas game for kids creation!

Save your precious pixel bits from all the bit smashers! Save My Pixel is a simple but extremely addictive 1-button arcade game. Jump and avoid getting hit by the bit smashers (obstacles), dodge the spikes and survive as long as you can. The game's speed increases and gets more challenging as you save more pixels and score more points. The game features minimal graphics and design and focusses on the gameplay. You will love this super-addictive spike escape game. Get this free game for your Android mobile device, download today! Don't download the rip-offs! Download the original Save My Pixel for a great, incredibly awesome experience.

Tested and well reviewed in Scootering Januar 2013 by Sticky, author of the Complete Spanners Lambretta manual Sticky: "The fact that it works at all - let alone working this well - is just plain wizardry" SIP HorsePower Dyno(MicroDyno) for Android -unlike all other Dyno Apps out there- doesn't use the acceleration or GPS sensor, because both aren't exact enough to achieve a good measuring result. SIP HorsePower Dyno(MicroDyno) can measure the rpm of the engine by analyzing the exact frequency, recorded with the microphone (Screenshot 1: in the middle you can clearly see accelerating in 1st, 2nd and 3rd gear). The faster the rpm increases, the better the performance of the engine. The gear ratio of our rides remains the same as long as there is no shift of gears. This way, the speed can be calculated from the rpm just as you can then calculate the performance by the change of speed which equals acceleration. To obtain the most realistic performance value possible, you need to enter a couple of values as precisely as possible: - overall weight - tire circumference - air pressure - temperature - gear ratio - Cw-Value (Tough one, but if you don't change this for different runs, you get repeatable and combarable results, this value moves the resulting curve on the y-axis, so it can be used to calibrate the dyno. If this value is way off the result can be off about 2 PS) If you know the Windows programs SIP Dyno and GSF Dyno, you know how exact these measurements are. You can find a couple of comparisons between GSF Dyno, this App and a real dyno (P4) at www.siphorsepowerdyno.de and in the Scootering from January 2013. Requirements: - This App only works if there is no shift in gears. The method doesn’t work with automatic scooters. - This App might not work for cars. It was tested on Vespas and Lambrettas which have a 1 cylinder 2 stroke engine. Please be aware that this is a very technical App. I cut the important things down as much as i could and added a "?-Button" on every page inside the App. Please read the information carefully. Check out www.siphorsepowerdyno.de or my YouTube-Channel for a tutorial. If you have any problems, contact me and I will guide you through. Important: There is a software failure in some Samsung Galaxy Ace and Samsung Galaxy Young devices. I included a fix for this, in Settings-> scroll to bottom ->"Samsung Fix" Supported by SIP Scootershop GmbH
release_text: Christmas sale: 0.99 € 2.059: RangeSeekBar added, Weather fixed 2.057: Bugtracking update, see Update Info in the app 2.056: ★ Renamed app to MicroDyno ★ clearer, more structured Settings ★ Option to hide the back button ★ Option for multiple runs without editing ★ "Trim Screen": the whole record is displayed as a spectrum, when moving the bars to cut the record the part of the spectrum, which will be further processed is shown

App that helps developers understand KitKat's new Host Card Emulation feature for payments. App allows you to enter your own magnetic stripe data from a Visa card and use in an NFC payment protocol called Visa MSD. While Visa did not intend for card holders to use their data this way, the app will work with Visa cards from most banks. Visa MSD is a supported payment protocol by most NFC payment terminals in the United States and Canada. To obtain the magnetic stripe data from your card, you will need a reader. In the US, they are available on both Amazon and Ebay for around $20 delivered. The inexpensive ones are USB devices that act as keyboard input, so no special drivers are needed on Windows or Mac OS X computers. While I'm sure there's more secure options, you can use an app like Google Keep to quickly transfer the swipe input to your phone and paste it into the app. The card data entered into the app is stored using Android's SharedPreference API in a way that is not accessible by other apps on a non-rooted phone. The full source code to SwipeYours is available on Github: https://github.com/dimalinux/SwipeYours Blog describing many details of SwipeYours: http://blog.simplytapp.com/2014/01/host-card-emulation-series-swipeyours.html SwipeYours requires both NFC and Android 4.4 (KitKat) or newer for HCE (Host Card Emulation). Privacy: This app has no Internet permissions and will not transfer your card information anywhere other than over the NFC interface for payments.

description: You are on a mission to collect all the rare gems beneath the earth. the only trouble, BIG ROLLING STONE OF DEATH! This is a game of run or death with epic moody hell environment and scorching heat, you must do your best to out the rolling stone while collecting all the precious gems of earth core! Try to escape the Rolling Stone of Scorching Hell Boulders !! This game features **** Fun Temple Run game play **** Easy swipe lane control **** Swipe to jump and down to slide **** Scary as hell rolling stone following you to death **** moody game music **** fluid and gorgeous 3D graphics environments and characters

Have your voicemails accumulate in your email box with no easy way to access, organize or search through them? VoiceMail Inbox app is here to help. The app will automatically download messages with attached voice sound files stored in your Gmail email account. Play back messages, powerful text search through voicemails and transcripts, forward voicemails via email, and integrate with contact list from the address book stored on your device. Full Feature List: * AUTO EXTRACT AND DOWNLOAD VOICEMAILS FROM EMAILS Automatically download and store on your device voicemail messages and sound files from your Gmail email account. Currently supported VoIP providers include ** Vonage, ** Google Voice, ** YouMail ** Freephoneline and Worldline ** CBB Mobil ** Rogers ** Efax ** PhonePower ** VoiceCloud ** Vodaphone NZ ** MegFon.ru ** VoipInterface.net Gmail credentials are stored on your device and exchanged only with Google gmail.com service. Sound file attachment is required. *NO EXTRA SERVICE SUBSCRIPTIONS No need to subscribe to any third party services other than Gmail and your VoIP provider. *SMART SEARCH THROUGH DOWNLOADED VOICEMAILS Easily search and filter voice mails by key words in voicemail transcripts, phone numbers, and associated contact names. *FORWARD VOICEMAILS Forward downloaded voicemails via email to any recipient. *ADDRESSBOOK INTEGRATION Add phone numbers to the address book stored on your device directly from the application. *CALLBACK Initiate call back to voice mail originators from within the app Note: for Vonage messages, please enable voicemail to email feature with .WAV sound message file attachments in your Vonage web account. For Support and troubleshooting please visit support forum at www.appbird.com or email support@appbird.com . Thank you for your interest! We hope you'll find this app useful. Appbird Team
release_text: * added support for megafon.ru * added support for voipinterface.net * added support for Efax, VoiceCloud, Vodaphone NZ * minor bug fixes

description: Wish l!st is your personal wishlist companion. The app allows you to manage all the items you want to buy by adding them to your wishlist. Wish l!st is great while shopping by always having your wishlist with you. With the gift list feature you can mark items as gift idea and share your gift list with your friends, family or maybe Santa. This makes Wish l!st the ideal app for creating a Christmas list, birthday list or any other special events. Wish l!st can sort your items by fields like category, priority or price. You can also track your purchased items in the purchased list for a overview of your spending's in the past. Most important features: - Manage items in your wishlist. - Stores related information like price, priority and comments. - Add pictures to your wish list items. - Purchased history. - Quick item overview. - Sorting by category, title, price or priority. - Customizable categories list. - Subtotals. - Share your gift list with your friends. - Backup/Restore to SD. - Full language support for: English, Dutch, German, Italian "Wish l!st free | Wish list app is a simple tool that allows users to manage their wish list easily. - Editor's Pick from AppEggs.com" "An excellent app - Editor's Choice from DroidAppOfTheDay.com"
release_text: - Fixed: On some devices the expand indicator for categories could be displayed incorrectly. - Fixed: Performing an internet search from the context menu in the items list screen would create an incorrect search phrase. - Fixed: Possible crash when resuming the edit category screen. - Changed: Performance improvements. - Changed: Performing an internet search for an item will now open the default browser on the device and now uses Amazon to perform the search query.

description: LÄXHJÄLPEN är en app som kan användas som komplement och omväxling i läxläsningen. Det är många gånger stressigt att hinna med läxorna när man kommer hem från aktiviteter eller sena eftermiddagar, och läxorna blir ett stressmoment både för föräldrarna och barnen. Vilket kan leda till att skola och läxorna blir ett negativt moment på dagen. LÄXHJÄLPEN passar utmärkt om man skall lära sig sifferkompisar, dubblor, gångertabellen, räkna med minus och plus. LÄXHJÄLPEN är en app som ni kommer använda i flera terminer. Att läsa läxa varje dag kan vara en utmaning för både barnet och föräldrar. Som komplement och omväxling till den vanliga läxläsnings rutinerna kan man använda den här applikationen. När läxorna blir enformiga eller man behöver omväxling i läxorna är LÄXHJÄLPEN ett utmärkt verktyg. LÄXHJÄLPEN behöver ingen uppkoppling, vilket innebär att man t.ex. kan träna på veckans läxa när man sitter i bilen eller bussen. Homework is an app that can be used to complement and variety in homework. It is often stressful to keep up with their homework when they get home from activities or late afternoons, and homework becomes a stress factor for both parents and children. Which may lead to school homework and is a negative torque on the day. Homework is ideal if one is to learn numerical buddies, doubles, times table, expect minus and plus. Homework is an app that you will use for several semesters. Reading homework every day can be a challenge for both the child and parents. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application. When homework is getting monotonous or you need variety in their homework is homework a great tool. Homework requires no connections, which means that eg can work on this week's homework while sitting in a car or bus.

The Tanner-Whitehouse method is the bone age scoring system favoured by Paediatric Endocrinologists everywhere. It takes longer to do than the Greulich & Pyle, and we always put it off to the end of clinic because we have to find a computer and get the atlas out. Now you can score it in clinic, quickly. Bone Age contains a dictionary of the criteria to remind you of the grades for each bone - just select one for each bone and move on to the next. It will tell you when all the bones have been scored and generate a bone age (either TWII or TWIII) for the RUS or the carpal bones, or if you prefer TWII, a 'twenty bone' score as well.
release_text: Version 1.1 contains bug fixes preventing crashing with newer Android releases and inaccuracies with removal of grade scores. Feedback always gratefully received. Version 1.2 Optimised now for Android Lollipop (5.0) with Material Design.

description: Sudoku is the crossword puzzle of numbers! If you love searching for winning combinations of letters and words you will love Sudoku Cards! Play legitimate, high quality sudoku cards with unique solutions--completely free! New to sudoku? Beginner? Pro? No need to worry! Sudoku Cards has three different difficulties! Features: -Free! -Notes -Easy, medium, and hard difficulties -Real sudoku puzzles with one unique solution -Undo, redo, and hints -Statistics -Easy to use interface -Big buttons -Saves your game automatically -Leaderboards and Achievements so you can play against your friends Download now!

Squash Bugs! This fun and addicting game will have you frantically squishing and smashing bugs against the clock. Each progressively harder level has a different mix of bugs to smash including different types of flies, spiders, dragon flies, beetles, ants, inch worms, caterpillars, butterflies, bees, lady bugs, and more! The more bugs you get in a row, the more "rage" you generate to kill even more bugs! And get power-ups like a big hand, double hands and nuke bugs! You can also squash bugs just for fun without caring about the levels or score. Put the game in "kids mode" to keep your little ones occupied without worrying that they will accidentally hit the menu buttons or having to deal with level goals. This game has a Halloween theme with spooky sounds, pumpkins, and even ghosts to try and get! Play this game year round to squash bugs anytime, and enjoy the scary sound effects! The lite (and free) version allows you to try out the game by squashing many of the bugs available. The full version adds progressively harder levels with goals, and more bug behaviors to deal with.
release_text: More new bonus levels. Big time performance improvements. Improved game play and bug fixes.

description: Why Children Hate to Eat Vegetables? Nowadays our children are exposed to a lot of junk food and they love them too much. We really want our children to like fruits and vegetables but it's not been easy. They are already used to eating junk foods from infancy. This App helps our children to learn about healthy nutritious food such as fruits and vegetables and hopefully it will make our children enjoy having such healthy food. App features: - Attractive and funny pictures - Cross section of fruits and vegetables. - Name pronunciation. IF YOUR KIDS LIKE IT, PLEASE GIVE ME YOUR FEEDBACK, RATE OR COMMENT FOR FUTHER INPUT AND UPDATE. THANKS.

** Lots of Street Basketball Big Win Shoot Fun!** *Cool sims basketball, paper trash can shooting skills* Here's a sims basketball shooting game with a difference. How are you shooting skills? This is NOT a best real basketball game by the way. Instead we have worked to create a fun filled street basketball paper trash can game for hours of fun-filled enjoyment.Big Win Trash Basketball Shoot has simple yet addicitve game play. So let's look at the game play and see how it is played. First the paper trash ball drops from the shute on the right of your screen in this sims basketball game. Your task is then to carefully bounce the ball across the junk yard to the paper trash can without it touching the ground. To do this you have to draw rubber bands with your finger for the paper trash ball to bounce off. You need to be quick or the ball will touch the ground and you will lose. Next you have to master the height of each bounce so you can navigate the junk yard obstacles on your way to the paper trash can. Here is where you hone your shooting skills. You get the paper trash ball to bounce higher by allowing it to drop further first. Small drops in height equal small bounces. Large drops equal higher bounces. You also have to create angles when you draw your rubber bands to have the sims basketball go to the left or the right in this street basketball hoopz game. This is vital to lean for your shooting skills. There are many levels and each one has more and more difficulty built in... yes they do get harder and harder. The obstacles you have to overcome get larger and more complex and the navigation difficulty rises. You will be well and truly tested in this sims basketball app before you achieve all levels in this awesome street basketball hoopz game. This is street basketball hoopz at it's funniest. Laugh along as you dodge car tyres, car bodies, piles of trash and more and maneuver your paper trash ball ever closer to the hoop. Bounce your paper trash ball all the way over to the basket and drop it in for a paper trash can big win. This an addictive street basketball hoopz shoot game play and fun for all ages. Nice graphics and game style.

Gun Maker 2 lets you decide everything. You pick every part. Flip it, scale it, rotate it, color it, do whatever you want! If you can think it, you can build it! Math Formulae Lite is one unique and comprehensive app that is particularly designed as a one-stop solution for College Grade/Higher Grade Students. It lists out all the important formulas/topics in Algebra, Geometry, Trigonometry and Calculus. Regular review of these formulas/concepts will definitely help improve your grades. The topics covered include: ALGEBRA Basic Properties and Facts Factoring and Solving Formulas Factoring and solving Methods (completing the squares methods etc...) Functions and Graphs Common Algebraic Errors GEOMETRY Points and Lines Angles Triangles Quadrilaterals Polygons Circles Coordinate Geometry Measurement Formulas TRIGONOMETRY Definitions Facts and Properties Formulas and Identities Unit Circle Inverse Trigonometric Functions Law of Sines, Cosines and Tangents CALCULUS Limits Derivatives Integrals Laplace Transforms

description: Welcome to the latest and greatest version of Calculator & Tracker for WWPP - Version 4! This release has been months in the making and has been rewritten and redesigned from the ground up to make updates and enhancements easier than ever. Calculate your food's points using the new Weight Watchers Points Plus system or the original Classic Points system, then record these points using the new and improved tracker. Don't know how many points you can eat on a daily basis? Use the Daily Points Allowance section inside the app! Don't want to have to enter your food's nutritional facts over and over again? Good! In the latest version you can store these foods in your personal food database which allows for quick & easy access to the 20 foods you eat most frequently. An in-app purchase will unlock your entire food database. --- In-App Purchase Descriptions • Ad Removal - Removes ads from the bottom of the screen. • FULL Pro - Includes ad removal & unlocks your Food List. --- Some Notable V4.0 Features • View your daily points history! • All fields now accept decimal values! • All in-app purchase bugs are fixed. • All V3.x bugs are fixed! --- NOTE: This application is not affiliated with Weight Watchers International. Please send all bug reports & feature requests to android@mattdonders.com before leaving negative comments as I will try to fix them in the next version.
release_text: V4.1.0 - To the Cloud! • Food List now syncs to the cloud and should sync between devices! You may have to Force Restore on second device. • Tutorial can now be replayed via Settings Menu. • Fixed issue where poitns added from Food List wouldn't count towards Bonus. • Fixed rare issue where in-app purchase wasn't recognized.

description: Grand Kayaking - Water sports game - best Android kayak simulator is finally here. Enjoy kayaking through rivers and lakes, fight the rapids, avoid rocks and beat your best score! Now you can choose kayak model and level up kayaker/canoeist! User comments: ★★★★★ - "The GRAND KAYAKING it's true adventure that gives you awesome opportunity to take part in all kinds of water sports." ★★★★★ - "Brilliant simulation, very intuitive steering, breathtaking views and many more..." What is Grand Kayaking? Whitewater kayaking is the sport of paddling a kayak on a moving body of water, typically a whitewater river. Whitewater kayaking can range from active, moving water, to demanding, extreme whitewater. Grand Kayaking - is a game that encapsulates of all the above, with only difference that you paddle by swiping your fingers down the screen. It offers various range of experiences from calm lakes to fast and deceptive mountain rivers. This kayak simulator lets you fill like were on the real whitewater canoeing, with all it's graphics and ambient nature sounds! Grand Kayaking game features: • Canoeing with unique steering • 2 totally different canoe models • 5 vast and varied maps, including rivers, lake, and Olympic track • Three game modes • Kayaker skills progression • Unlockable levels • Quality HD graphics • It's totally free Content coming soon: • Social platforms integration (Facebook), leaderboards, highscores • Rapids - fight the rapids and prevent kayak from falling into the rocks • New maps, including Grand Canyon rivers • New canoe models • Upgraded simulator controls The Grand Kayaking is a truly excellent game for players in all ages. Everybody - from toddler to greybeard - will find lots of good fun. Content is age-appropriate for kids, children, teenagers, adults and elderly. You can find us at: WWW: http://moonlit.pl Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/moonlit.games.studio Twitter: https://twitter.com/moonlitgs Google Plus: http://google.com/+MoonlitPlus

In this application, users engage in battle with werewolves online. New users, please refer to the “Entry method” segment in the Help section - The Werewolf game In this game, players are divided into a werewolf camp or a villagers camp. The villagers must attempt to discover the identity of the werewolves by questioning one another. During each unit of time that represents a “day”, players vote for the characters they suspect to be werewolves. The character that receives the most votes is then executed. During the same period, the werewolves can select one character to attack. Victory for the villagers is achieved by executing all werewolves. Victory for the werewolves is achieved by whittling down the villagers until they are outnumbered. - Special features of this application *As Online Werewolf X supports both Web and Smart Phone platforms, users can play and enjoy the game on their preferred device. *As there is no requirement for a Game Manager, users who create villages can also participate in the game. *All players should act out the part of a character. Their preferred image can be selected for use as a character icon. - Local Rules A number of local rules can apply to Werewolf. The following are those relating to the app. *Games are conducted with a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 16 participants. *Roles are automatically allocated based on the number of participants. *Lynching, divining, bodyguarding and attacking can all be conducted from Day One. - Cautions *A Google account is required to participate in the game. *At the end of each game, each participant's identity will be published. Please enter the name you wish to be used in the user information area. *Please refrain from behaviour and contributions that may upset or inconvenience other players.

description: The popular FREE "Stopwatch & Timer" app on Android. Beautifully clean, simple and reliable. Used by millions of people since 2009. Easy to read large digits and a full screen mode. Notification of time elapsed or remaining in the notification bar so you can see with out opening the app. The timer remembers your last 3 countdown times for quick re-use. Customize the look with a choice of several colors and fonts. Perfect for every timing situation (sports, games, work and of course cooking). See app menu for options. FOR MORE FEATURES: See paid app "Stopwatch & Timer+" for: https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jupiterapps.stopwatch ★ 99 hours ★ Multiple timers / stopwatches ★ Renaming of timers and laps ★ Export by email ★ Countdown then up ★ Countdown and repeat (loop timers) ★ Countdown then start next (chain timers) ★ 1/100ths (optional) ★ Show current lap (optional) ★ Control timer groups ★ Reorder timers Link is in menu under "More apps". NOTE: Internet access permission is for optional free app offers ONLY when closing the app (interstitial by AppBrain). There are NO push ads , NO in app ad, NO spyware and NEVER will be. The interstitial option "would you like more free apps" - "yes" or "no" only shows -occasionally- when closing the app. Click "no" if you don't want to see the offers. If you dislike the permission, need more features or find the app useful and want to support a small developer StopWatch & Timer+ is available. https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jupiterapps.stopwatch To stop an alarm press Reset or drag down the status bar. To make an alarm insistent select "until canceled" in the settings. Online stopwatch http://stopwatchtimers.com/stopwatch/ Online timer http://stopwatchtimers.com/timer/
release_text: V1.33 Updated SDK with notification improvements on Lollipop Now also option to use on your desktop http://stopwatchtimers.com/stopwatch/ And a Chrome app https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stopwatch-timer/eoiibkbchfmgmhlodifjceiginokllbj

description: Frame Collage is the best professional photo collage maker for android. Frame Collage helps you to quickly combine multiple photos in to beautiful looking frames/collage/grid and it allows you to share your beautiful work to social networks like Instagram and Facebook. You can create beautiful photo frames/photo collages using this app. Frame Collage supports powerful photo editor or image editor, you can apply awesome photo effects and also you can crop, rotate, flip, whiten your images.There are other photo editing options also. Frame Collage also supports different kinds of shapes like heart,flower etc, you can decorate or frame your images using this shapes. Frame Collage allows you to post multiple photos on Instagram with cropping, it's like insta shape and insta size. Features: ------------ * Around 50 beautiful looking frames. * Beautiful shapes like love, apple,butterfly etc * Beautiful colors and patterns for frames. * Adjustable border width. * Beautiful photo effects and photo editor. * Supports filters like brightness,contrast etc and also photo editing options like zoom,rotate,crop,redeye etc. * Share to social networks like Instagram,Facebook,Gmail etc.

description: The Magnifying Glass it does what it claims to do - it magnifies what one is looking at through the camera. This simple Magnifying Glass will magnify anything you want just launch it and point at the item. It now will freeze the item you are viewing. If you have a camera or tablet and it does not have a flash on it then the light on the application will not work. A Mirror option has been added for anyone needing a quick mirror to check out makeup or just admire yourself using the front camera of your phone. Hope you like the new mirror if you have a front camera. This application is now open sourced looking for other developers and testers for all the platforms to help out. If you want go to http://code.google.com/p/magnifying-glass/ and contact me to start contributing.
release_text: Added touch screen features: pinch to zoom in and zoom out tap one time to focus long press to freeze image flick the screen to turn on and off the light

description: IVONA - The leader in realistic, natural-sounding & accurate TTS voices for your Android device. No more robotic, sythesized voices. IVONA for Android replaces the synthesized text-to-speech (TTS) voices currently available on your Android device with more natural sounding, accurate & easy-to-understand voices. Select from 13 different languages to find the one best suited for you. Easy to install one or several different voices! IVONA is compatible with many of your favorite Android applications. With IVONA, enjoy: ☆ Turn-by-turn voice navigation so you can keep your eyes on the road (e.g. Google Maps) ☆ Have your ebooks naturally read aloud to you (e.g. Moon+ Reader Pro) ☆ Listen to online content, articles, PDF documents & RSS feeds (e.g. Pocket, ezPDF Reader, gReader) ☆ Change the voice on your virtual assistant (e.g. Jeannie, iris, Skyvi) Plus: ☆ Enjoy improved accessibility (e.g. TalkBack built-into Android) ☆ Increase your productivity (e.g. Driving Mode built-into Android) Key features include: • BrightVoice technology provides lifelike, expressive reading of all your text • Clear & easy-to-understand sound – even in noisy environments • A rapidly expanding portfolio of award-winning voices available in multiple languages, accents & genders • Easy-to-install & use with automatic, free updates Get started in 4 easy steps: 1. Install IVONA Text-to-Speech HQ to your Android device from the Google Play store 2. Select & install your preferred language and voice(s) from the Google Play store 3. Once downloaded, launch the IVONA app to complete your installation 4. Finally, Select IVONA TTS Engine as your default engine by navigating to Android Settings Now you’re ready to experience world-class IVONA Text-to-Speech & IVONA voices on your favorite text-to-speech enabled Android apps. This Free beta version will work without any limitations till beta tests ends. Contact Us: We want to hear from you. If you have a concern, kindly email us and we will do our best to resolve the issue. Email: support.android@ivona.com Browse FAQs: http://mobile.faq.ivona.com/pkb_mobile_i4m?l=en_US#home/l:en_US Visit us: http://ivona.com Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ivonatts Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ivonatts Follow us on Google+: https://plus.google.com/+ivona/posts Languages currently supported: English (US) English (UK) English (AU) French German Icelandic Italian Polish Romanian Spanish Spanish (US) Welsh Welsh English
release_text: * Improved FAQ webpage * New voice data installer (IVONA HQ update required) * Major bug fixes.

description: Watch FREE full-length Movies, Films, TV Shows, Documentaries and Funny Comedy Shorts all on your Android mobile phone, tablet, and Android TV! Over 5,000 independent movies, TV shows and documentaries. New movies and new titles added every month! Our film library features full-length independent movies, adrenaline-filled action-adventure films, and international Bollywood & Gollywood movies. We also offer special-interest gay & lesbian movies, hilarious comedy films and critically acclaimed documentaries all FREE to watch! Download SnagFilms and start viewing today! Watch it on Android phones, tablets & Android TV! ***MOVIES*** + Full-length Movies like “Holy Rollers”, “Brooklyn Rules” and “The Slaughter Rule” + Movie Categories including: Action, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Comedy, Thrillers, Erotic Thrillers and Romance + Hard-to-find Indie movies + Classic movies, cult horror, silent movies, and Golden Age films ***KIDS & FAMILY-FRIENDLY*** + Full-length Kids and Family-friendly movies + TV for the family from animation to animals in nature and a whole bunch of TV cartoons for kids ***FOREIGN FILMS*** + Full-length, subtitled international movies from all over the world + Indian & Hindi Bollywood films + African Nollywood (Nigeria) and Gollywood (Ghana) films + Spanish-language movies + Japanese movies + Chinese and Korean dramas + Plus Movies in Arabic, Russian, French, Dutch, and many more! ***DOCUMENTARIES*** + Critically acclaimed documentaries like “Super Size Me”, “Trashed”, “Nanking”, “Restrepo” + Full-length documentaries, full-episode TV documentaries + Exciting nature and animal shows with eye-opening environmental documentaries ***TV SHOWS*** + Full-Episode TV shows with full seasons + TV shows: comedy shows, nature shows, cartoons, animated series, anime + Watch complete TV show episodes - with full seasons from National Geographic, NatGeo, and more ***ORIGINAL COMEDIES*** + Original comedy shorts, hilarious & funny clips, videos, and stand-up performances + Featuring comics like Lewis Black, Jim Gaffigan, Michael Showalter, and many others ***SPECIAL INTEREST TOPICS*** + Live Music performances from artists like Method Man and Twisted Sister + Biographies of notable celebrities, pop icons and famous personalities like Tupac Shakur, Kurt Cobain, Steve Jobs, and Betty Page + Pop Culture topics like Star Wars, video gamers and even life after the adult industry + Thought-provoking & funny gay, lesbian and LGBT films ***HONORS*** + Tech Cocktail "Best App for Watching Movies" + Chicago Tribune "Best Mobile Apps for Channel Surfing" + Gizmodo.com "Top App" ***FEATURES*** + Watch on your TV, Android Phone or Tablet, Google TV or Android TV + Add films to your queue to watch later + Sync videos between Android Phone, Android Tablet, Android TV, Google TV and SnagFilms.com + 17 movie, TV show & documentary categories, including festival films and award winners + In-app sharing with Facebook and Twitter + Search for films and sort movies by genre, topic and run time ***ABOUT SNAGFILMS*** SnagFilms is like that cool local video store with unique indie films and exciting hidden movie treasures – except everything can be watched online! For those of us looking to discover something different, SnagFilms has over 5,000 movies, TV show episodes, eye-opening documentaries and exclusive original comedy shorts. There is something to watch for everyone! FOLLOW US! Twitter.com/SnagFilms Facebook.com/SnagFilms USER NOTES - A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for quality viewing. A weak 3G/4G cellular connection may result in audio-only playback.

description: From the creators of Tiny Tower comes Pocket Planes, a casual airline sim that fits right in your pocket! - Manage and grow your fleet of planes as they fly interesting people and cargo to over 250 cities around the map. - Unlock everything from tiny prop planes to jumbo jets and small town airports to mega cities. - Customize your planes with your own paint jobs and pilot uniforms. - Trade plane parts among your friends, and compete in worldwide group events. - See how you stack up against your friends with tons of stats and leader boards.

Unicode Chars Map is a small and simple application that gives you access to all Unicode Chars, from Arabic and Hebrew to Javanese or Ethiopic. Unicode Chars is the ideal application to use unicode characters in your message or mail thanks to its paste to clipboard feature. Following your device's fonts, some characters could be not supported and displayed as empty rectangles. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have feedbacks or comments to improve the app by email : sylvain.saurel@gmail.com

Record movies silently in background while browsing web pages, playing game, using navigation or even with screen turned off. No one will know that you are recording. Simply press application icon and continue using your phone. Movie will be recorded until application icon is pressed again. Your movie will wait for you in external memory. Record duration in free version is limited to 30 or 60 seconds. Please consider buying PRO version for unlimited recording duration. You can use application as a: ★ Hidden recorder - use your phone as a spy camera and record your surroundings while making a phone call or with disabled screen (no one will notice that recorder is on), ★ Car video camera / dashcam - record your drive while using gps navigation at the same time, ★ Security camera - just leave it in a room, disable screen and record while you are gone. Features: • No preview, • No shutter sound (on most devices), • HD (1080p) recording, • Support for both front and back camera, • Selecting records quality (for longer recordings at the same storage), • Notification icon can be hidden - no one can tell that recorder is on, • Recording for specified duration or until manual stop, • Browsing / deleting movies directly from aplication. Known issues: • In some counties legal obligations will not allow to disable shutter sound, • Some devices will record front camera videos with wrong rotation. It can be easily fixed by changing 'Recording rotation' in options. • If movies are not visible after connecting Nexus 4 or Nexus 7 to the computer phone / tablet has to be restarted to make recordings visible (this is well known problem with those two devices). • Some Samsung devices returns internal memory when asked for 'external memory'. That's why movies are saved there instead of on SD Card. • In any other cases please contact as at hello@lofatsoftware.com . We will do our best to fix a problem as soon as possible. Please be aware that it is your responsibility to use this application with respect to people's privacy and in compliance with the law. Thank you.
release_text: 1. Experimental option for changing movies directory path. It can be used to record movies directly to SD card (in case of device having both internal memory and SD card slot). 2. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) link added in settings.

Author Jennifer Ensley and best-selling artist Phatpuppy present "Cursed by Diamonds"! What if a pure and loving heart unintentionally caused Angels to fall, demons to rise, and blurred the line between heaven and hell? Jenevier owns such a heart. An innocent, unadulterated purity that is too quick to find good where none exists. Her blind trust and radiant soul could be the answer long sought, or, it could mark the end of us all. FEATURES -Story narrated by the author, Jennifer Ensley -Beautiful stages by acclaimed artist Phatpuppy! -3 game modes: CASUAL, NORMAL, and CHALLENGE -4 ways to find items: PICTURE, SILHOUETTE, WORDS and RANDOM -2 difficulty settings: NORMAL and HARD -Training mode and hints are included Have fun!

description: This app allows you to keep your screen on *only* when the device is connected to USB and Debugging (ADB) is enabled. It switches to the previously set display timeout when the device is unplugged or plugged into a wall socket. Permissions: WRITE_SETTINGS to store the old display timeout. INTERNET for Crashlytics (crash reports) Note: If the app crashes, please send the crash report so that I can fix it. No user-specific information is sent, only information related to the crash (stacktrace) and device information like OS version, free space, rooted/non-rooted, free RAM, etc, is sent. This application is open-source under the Apache license. GitHub: https://github.com/AfzalivE/AwakeDebug/ DISCLAIMER: I am not responsible for any damage to the device caused by having the screen stay awake for long periods of time.

description: Play a part in the magic story with a new beautifully illustrated storybook. Classic fairy tale Three Little Pigs is a perfect reading experience for your kids. Lots of interactions and mini-games are built into the story. Features: ♦ Enjoy numerous mini games inside ♦ Splendid sound effects and professional voice overs turn reading into breathtaking process ♦ Choose between "Read by me" and "read to me" options ♦ Great learning practice for your kids ♦ 400+ interactive elements ♦ Kind and cheerful book characters ♦ The book perfectly fits for preschool activities Once upon a time... There were three merry little pigs - Spotty, Fluffy and Whitey. They spent all the summer playing in the forest and having a great time. But soon they will have to meet a lot of challenges on their way... Three Little Pigs is a beautiful children storybook with numerous interactive elements inside. One of the main book features is a great number of mini games. It has a lot of captivating educational games on each page which help your children to learn playing. Put the parts of the house together, help the pigs to run away from the wolf or build new solid houses for them! Your kids are sure to enjoy an exceptional reading experience as they follow this remarkable storyline which includes numerous learning tasks for preschool activity. Choose between “Read to me” and "Read by me" modes. Watch your children as they become engaged and charmed by this amazing fairytale and enjoy entrancing interactive elements. From page to page the aim is to help little pigs to go through all the challenges they meet on their way. Three Little Pigs interactive story offers a new way of telling stories and will help your children to get acquainted with the unbelievable world of literature. The book grants not just reading, but also a great number of mini-games to develop creative thinking, attention and logic skills. Tap on the screen to move objects and discover new scenes, while the story unfolds. Vivid illustrations bring unforgettable moments to the life of your kids. This is a book that should be read to every child!

Dashboard Cam - Widget, Compass Map, GPS Data, Remote Controller, External GPS Support NEW: Generate GPS overlaid video from recorded Video & GPS data file. Video disable sound option. Video overlay recording mode, convert images to single video file. Android Wear support. Remote app operations and gps data view, remote map views with zoom in and out. For more info visit at: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamwear.aspx For more information, please visit at: http://www.busywww.com * On Top Mode (Always stay on over the other running apps), with this mode, user could record video and gps data while using the other apps; like google navigator, google map, or other apps. For more Info please visit link for the visual help: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamhelpontop.aspx For video demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGC1QUgOv8k * GPS Data and Video Web Browser Player: please visit http://www.busywww.com * User can play and view recorded gps data from web browsers (recommend to use latest Chrome) 1. OBD Mode (Vehicle On Board Diagnostics): Vehicle Speed, RPM, and Engine Temperature 2. Google Map Version 2: Off-line Map and 3D View support 3. Sharing Current GPS Location: Email or other applications *** OBD Mode: see Help OBD Mode section for more information. Main Record Modes: * Video + GPS * Photo + GPS (Map and Speedo Overlay) * Widget: GPS Dashboard Cam allows the users to record video or take photo snaps in full screen camera images along with map compass and GPS speed information, and find out your driving statistics with GPS data recordings. And app could be used as car blackbox purposes. Widget Video Help (YouTube): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AyT2k3-Xupo KitKat Screen Record Sample: http://youtu.be/_B-7q4vH59w Dashboard Cam Widget is miniature application view that can be embedded in the Home screen. With widget, without the opening main application, user can display current GPS Speed and record the GPS data on demand. While widget app gps recording is running, user could open or use other applications without interrupting the gps service. Dashboard Cam android application could be controlled from remote android devices with realtime remote camera frame viewing. Remote control functions might be very useful: 1. When the android device is docked (or, located) at the places where hand controlling is limited. 2. Control the remote dashboard cam application from hard-mounted tablet devices. 3. Control the remote dashboard cam by another person who could not reach the remote device. For more information, please check following link. http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamremotehelp.htm Dashboard Cam supports external bluetooth gps. With external gps, the gps data accuracy will be improved in good rates. And it would be very useful in various situations. 1. Gps signal acquiring will be improved a lot. 2. Useful under the circumstances like forest, downtown city, or similar locations where gps signal is weak or blocked. 3. For the android devices without real gps devices or only with a-gps function, user now could enjoy all the application functions. For more information visit following link: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamgpshelp.htm Record Player with Overlay Customization Application includes special player and viewer for the specific purposes for the application. With player, user could view and play back recored images in animated format in full screen. With photo + gps data records, user could view or generate map + speed overlaied recordings later on. For the overlaied recording view, display and record settings are available for customized playback experiences.

description: More than 400 000 people all over the world enjoy this game every day. Incredibly beautiful and alike any other, The Gravity allures into its world everyone. You would like to know how? That’s simple. The game gives its users opportunity to get into mysterious world, where they will face the tasks, they could never imagine. The Gravity gives you a power, which you can only dream about in your life – power of the gravity. It is hard to resist such an opportunity, isn’t it? During the all game using this power you are to solve huge amount of various tasks. Move the whole massifs, spin everything as you wish, the game allows you to become sculptor of this world. Beautiful 3D graphics and atmospheric sound effects will help you to fully dive into the game and deal with all its tasks. Be sure, they exactly won’t be easy for you. Every time your power will be limited to some extent and how to spend it intelligently is the art of every player.

★★★ The best selling Australia Radio for the iPhone comes to Android! ★★★ Listen to over 100 Australian radio stations! Now with Twitter and Facebook support: tell your friends what radio station you're listening to, "live", without stopping your audio to invoke an external social client! Dynamic directory provides for adding new directories and stations from our servers with no need for an application update. Select your station by country or add your own favorite stream. You can also pick from your favorites or your recently played stations. You can even share with your friends iTunes links to a station stream using your iPad Mail application. And you can also post your favorite links directly to Twitter. FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS: * Includes SHOUTcast Australian stations * Includes over 100 stations from Australia and New Zealand * Links to Facebook and Twitter support pages on Help screen * Support for full-multitasking with Background Play
release_text: - App stops playing in the background during incoming calls - Fixed Twitter authentication

description: Do you miss Google Listen? Do you find other podcast apps too complicated or not functional enough? PodWave is the solution. You can search and subscribe to podcasts RSS feeds with ease. Podwave then downloads your podcasts after which you can listen to them. It supports the following features: * Resume broken or failed downloads. * Can block downloads over 3G and only download on WiFi, if you wish. * Plays in the background (without being killed) * Responds to media buttons on headsets * Plays over Bluetooth connections * Automatically deletes listened Podcasts after a user set period * Drag and drop playlists sorting by tapping on the logo * Search for podcasts or add podcast feed url's manually. Even though it's inspired by Google Listen it is differently organized but it's navigation is very familiar. It does not support Google Reader integration yet. That will be added in the next release. Explanation of Permissions * INTERNET : For downloading and updating podcasts * WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Downloaded podcasts are stored on the external card * ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: To check if Wifi is enabled when you set "enable wifi download only" * ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: see WIFI_STATE * WAKE_LOCK: to keep the player running when in the background or screen off * RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: To restart updating after a reboot * READ_PHONE_STATE: For disabling playing when a call is received I hope you like it. Please leave feedback if you experience issues. Note: Paid version removes ads.
release_text: Release 1.0 Bug fixes * Fixes an issue with the playlist.

description: GET YOUR QUICK FIX OF RUGBY! Tru Blu Entertainment and Wicked Witch Software present Jonah Lomu Rugby Challenge: Quick Match edition. Designed for quick play and on the go fun, starring Rugby legend: Jonah Lomu! STARRING JONAH LOMU! The only app to exclusively feature Jonah Lomu! Step into the sublime boots of Jonah! With advanced, life-like graphics, as you dominate the field with an All Star Jonah Lomu team, you can almost smell the sweat of being in the action. QUICK MATCH Play a Quick Match with all the passion, all the power and all the precision of the great Rugby legend in the best Rugby Union game! GAME CENTRE ACHIEVEMENTS / LEADERBOARDS Challenge your Rugby footwork and see how your abilities rank against your friends, or for a greater challenge, other gamers from around the world. FULL 3D! Features full 3D stadium, goals, ball and players with motion captured animations that create impressive and realistic visuals. Combined with stylish camera transitions and smooth effects you will be catapulted right into the action! FEATURES -- Multiple game settings -- Customise weather conditions, sound effects and more to your personal preferences! -- Develop your skills on ‘Easy’, or challenge yourself in ‘Legend’ mode -- Featuring Rugby Icon Jonah Lomu playing in an All Star Jonah Lomu Team -- Easy to learn, difficult to master, incredibly addictive! -- Life like animation -- Realistic ball physics -- True to life 3D stadium -- An incredibly realistic rugby experience with quality graphics & sound. -- Factor in real-life changing wind modelling conditions in your game play. -- Fully animated 3D motion captured players -- Dynamic camera angles -- Intuitive touch controls -- Saved high scores -- Online leaderboard – flaunt your achievements and see how you rank against players from across the world -- Facebook integration – compete with your friends to get the highest score and post brags to your wall FOLLOW US: -www.rugbychallengegame.com/ -www.facebook.com/RugbyChallengeGame -www.twitter.com/rugby_challenge

This is a must-have software . Completely free tool. Create your own UNLIMITED ringtones，alarm, or notification sound from an existing audio file. That's all, create ringtone no easier than this! After clip ringtones , and can easily be found in the ringtones library . And can be edited , assigned , or delete operation . Ringtone Cutter is the first and only application that allows you to create ring tones and tone without any time limit . You can edit or cut your ringtones in various formats like : mp3, aac, ogg, wav, aiff, mid & many more. Still the envy of others ringtones nicely it? Do not hesitate , now download "Ringtone Cutter" , began to DIY your own ring tones ! Features: - Shows WaveForm - Make Selection process easier with waveforms - Supports a variety of music formats, such as MP3, AAC, MP4, WAV, 3GPP, AMR. - Zoom in , zoom out waveforms - Tap anywhere on the waveform , the built-in Music player starts playing at that position. - Option to Name the new cut clip while saving it as Ringtone/Music/Alarm/Notification Tone. - Set the new clip as default ringtone or assign ringtone to contacts, using this ringtone editor. - With the media player , you can quickly play your edited ringtone . - Set ringtone, alarm , notification ringtones with single click - Record your own original ringtones; Disclaimer: "Ringtone Cutter" development based on open source Ringdroid library . While adhering to Apache License 2.0 .

description: ** Requires root ** This app is designed to fix update problems that come from mismatched signatures between Superuser.apk on your phone, and Superuser.apk on the Market. If successful, this app will let you update from the market even if you've had trouble before. Special thanks to Joël Bourquard for technical help writing this, and @fitsnugly on twitter for the icon. Note: This app requires busybox. A static build of busybox is included in the app, but is only used if you do not have busybox already installed. The included version should work on most phones. If it does not work for you, please email me at the link below so we can get it working. Support request emails that simply say "Doesn't work" or something to that effect are automatically deleted by our stupidity filter and will not be answered.
release_text: - Bundled busybox to ensure widest compatibility - Streamlined fix process

description: Have FUN with this NEW interactive and discoverable Little Town Live Wallpaper. Turn on the 40+ animated effects! The switches are everywhere across town. Just tap to discover! Look at the preview pictures and video for hints. Can you find them all? You can also adjust the size of the buildings, scrolling speed and sync day/night with the time. The entire town view is under your control! Make it your town! Enjoy! With a few taps, it serves as a great momentary distraction after a long day of mind numbing meeting or work; fascinate young kids or to keep them busy; as a fun conversation piece amongst group or friends. Its now all conveniently there on the home screen of your phone! This is a product of IEC content. Like and follow us on facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Interactive-Exchange-Company/

app_name: GMD Auto Hide Soft Keys ★ root
description: AHSK allows to hide navigation bar and auto show/hide it with simple swipe from bottom. It hides only navigation bar (soft keys) in Phone UI and does not hide notification bar. Requires ROOT! KitKat support added! Known issues: - On Android 4.4 (KitKat) Hiding/showing stock navigation bar will trigger lock screen. Unique features: - Hide just navigation bar and keep notifications bar. - Show Quick NavBar and click soft button with one simple swipe. - Spoof Soft Keys - make Android think you still have soft keys and display Menu button in applications actions bar. - Theme Quick NavBar - use any custom image for buttons. - Adjust trigger size and position. - Integrate with Gesture Control or Tasker using Shortcuts. - Stock firmwares, CyanogenMod, Pac Rom and Paranoid Android supported. - No modifications and no reboot required. PRO features: - Change trigger color and/or transparency. - Disable trigger (and Quick NavBar) if you use other alternative. JOIN Beta version community - https://plus.google.com/communities/115800359125266491041 AndroidPolice.com review: http://www.androidpolice.com/2013/06/04/new-app-gmd-hide-soft-keys-banishes-the-navigation-bar-for-root-users-nexus-only-for-now Other full screen apps hide notifications bar too and has no option to hide just navigation bar. Hide Soft Keys is different - it only removes navigation bar and replaces it with Quick NavBar. You can always access stock notifications list and recent applications list.
release_text: AHSK 3.1-release: - Fixed trigger issue on LG devices - Added trigger 'high priority' option - uncheck if it causes problems with brightness in video apps - Lollipop (Big) theme - Volume action - 'Close' button in help 3.0-release: - CM12 and CM12.1 support - New action: Launchpad - customizable floating folder anywhere - New action: Search - New action: Search (long click) - New action: Voice Search - Fixed: conflict with brightness control in some apps - Updated: user interface and icons

description: 腹筋や筋トレ、ジョギング等の運動実績、 体重やBMI等の身体情報履歴をアプリです。 消費カロリ自動計算、BGMプレイヤー付き。 トレーニング種別もカスタマイズ出来ます。 肉体改造のお供にどうぞ。 このアプリには以下の機能があります。 １.日付毎の運動実績の記録 ２.日付毎の身体情報履歴の記録 ３.筋トレ種別設定 ★ ４.指定筋トレ種別の運動実績一覧 ★ ５.筋トレの単位設定 ★ ６.指定実績値をカレンダへ表示 ７.プライバシーモード ８.ＢＧＭプレイヤー ９.筋トレ別実績集計 10.実績グラフ表示(身体情報/運動実績) ★…FREE版には無い機能 各機能の詳細は本説明の下部に 記載してあります。 なお、今後下記の機能を実装予定です ・ストップウォッチ ・タイマー ■対応OS Android2.2以上 なお、要望や不具合等ありましたら お手数ですがメールにて ご連絡を頂ければ対応致します。 ■機能詳細説明 １.日付毎の運動実績の記録 　１日ごとに下記項目の実績を 　記録出来ます。　 　①筋トレ種別 　②セット数 　③回数 　④消費カロリー(自動計算) ２.日付毎の身体情報履歴の記録 　１日ごとに下記の項目を記録出来ます。 　①体重 　②体脂肪率 　③ＢＭＩ(自動計算：要身長設定) 　④骨格筋率 　⑤摂取カロリー 　⑥消費カロリー(筋トレ実績から自動計算) ３.筋トレ種別設定 　メニューから選択して下さい。 　下記の項目を編集可能です。 　①種別名 　②単位 　③消費カロリー(１単位あたり)※ ※初期設定では各種別ともに体重60kg時の 　一回あたりの消費量を設定してあります。 　ご自分の体重や負荷に併せて設定を 　お願いします。 ４.指定筋トレ種別の運動実績一覧 　筋トレ種別設定画面にて特定の種別を 　ロングタップすることで表示される 　「登録済実績一覧」を選択して下さい。 　なお、表示された一覧からも 　該当実績の編集や削除が可能です。 ５.筋トレの単位設定 　単位名を登録編集可能です。 　なお、初期起動時に登録される１～７は 　編集や削除は出来ません。 ６.指定実績値をカレンダへ表示 　設定画面にて指定した項目が 　カレンダーの日付部に表示されます。 　２つ設定可能です。 ７.プライバシーモード 　設定することで起動時に 　パスワード認証が入るようになります。 　※要パスワード設定 ８.ＢＧＭプレイヤー 　本体orSDカード内の音楽ファイルを 　再生可能です。 ９.筋トレ別実績集計 　集計ページの[トレーニング別総実績] 　ボタンをタップすることで表示されます。 10.各種実績グラフ表示 　集計ページの[各種実績グラフ表示] 　ボタンをタップすることで表示されます。 　表示する項目と期間を指定して下さい。 ■画面ごとの操作補足 １．メイン画面：運動履歴 　カレンダーは上部左右ボタンの他に 　年月をタップすると年月指定、 　日付を左右上下にフリックすると 　前月や翌月にカレンダーが移動します。 ２．メイン画面：ＢＧＭ 　リスト下の曲名をタップすると 　再生中の曲が上から２番目あたりに 　来るようにリストがスクロールします ３．日付毎の履歴一覧 　・画面上部左右のボタンの他に 　　日付タップで日付指定が出来ます 　・各項目タップで内容の 　　表示／非表示を切り替えます 　・[+]ボタンでトレーニング実績を 　　追加します。 　・実績の削除はリストのトレーニング実績を 　　ロングタップするとメニューが開くので 　　そこから削除して下さい 　・本体のメニューボタンを押すと 　　専用メニューが開き、 　　そこから身体情報の表示ロックが可能 　　解除時にはパスワード入力が必要です。 　 ４．トレーニング実績入力 　・セット数は自動でカウントされます。 　・実績入力時、デフォルトとして前回実績が 　　設定されます。 ５．トレーニング種別編集 　・[+]ボタンで新規のトレーニングを 　　登録します。 　・新規登録時、登録済の種別と同じ名前は 　　登録出来ません 　・ロングタップで編集メニューが開きます 　・トレーニング実績データが存在する種別は 　　削除が出来ません。 ６．単位設定 　・[+]ボタンで新規の単位を登録します。 　・新規登録時、登録済の単位と同じ名前は 　　登録出来ません 　・ロングタップで編集メニューが開きます 　・トレーニング種別に割当られている単位は 　　編集や削除が出来ません。 ７．各種実績グラフ表示 　グラフを表示した際に現れる上部の 　[<<]と[>>]のボタンで表示する期間を 　移動させる事が出来ます。 ８．設定画面 ・身長 　設定している場合、日々の体重入力時に 　BMIが自動計算されます。 ・運動実績マーク表示 　ONになっている時、カレンダーの 　運動実績がある日付の横に★マークが 　表示されます。 　 ・カレンダ表示項目①、② 　カレンダーの日付部に表示したい項目を 　指定して下さい。 ■設定が保存出来ない方へ GALAXY S等のSamsung製機種には OSの不具合として 設定が保存出来ないバグが 確認されています。 アプリ起因ではありません。 ※…価格は税込み表記
release_text: ■Ver1.13 2015/03/18 【不具合修正】 ・OS4.4系で起動できない不具合を修正 ■Ver1.12 2013/02/13 【不具合修正】 ・一部機種で画面切替時に強制修正する不具合改修 ・タブの文字が見切れてしまう不具合改修 ■Ver1.11 2012/04/11 【不具合修正】 ・日付毎の履歴一覧画面にて左右ボタンで 日付を移動して月を跨いだ場合、 存在しない日付が表示される不具合改修 ■Ver1.10 2011/12/12 【不具合修正】 ・トレーニング実績編集画面において 一部機種でOKボタンが表示されない 不具合を改修。 ■Ver1.09 2011/10/03 【不具合修正】 ・ＢＧＭ再生時に一部の曲がリストに 表示されないバグ改修 【機能改善】 ・グラフの日付文字サイズ調整 ■Ver1.08 2011/07/16 【機能追加】 ・グラフ表示機能追加(トレーニング)

description: Język Niemiecki za darmo z aplikacją http://www.uczsiejezyka.pl Nauka niemieckiego jest prosta i przyjemna! Pobierz teraz bezpłatnie kurs języka niemieckiego i naucz się języka z naszą pomocą :) Bezpłatna aplikacja mobilna pozwala poznawać na Twoim smartfonie i tablecie: - słówka i zwroty w języku niemieckim (fiszki niemieckie) - gramatyka niemiecka - testy z języka niemieckiego - niemiecki słownik, tablice i ściąga z najważniejszymi tematami Aplikacja do niemieckiego zawiera takie tematy jak: Podstawy języka niemieckiego - powitania, pozdrowienia, pożegnania, telefon, liczby, dni, miesiące, pory roku, kolory Niemiecki potoczny - rozmówki niemieckie, schematy zdań, pytania o zdrowie, rozrywka, zabawa, gry, testy Niemiecki do szkoły - klasa, przedmioty, nauka, matura, studia Niemiecki do pracy - zawody, rozmowa rekrutacyjna, dane osobowe Niemiecki biznesowy - pieniądze, słownictwo bankowe, ubezpieczeniowe, inwestycyjne Język niemiecki dla turystów i emigrantów - kierunki, miejsca, położenie, życie za granicą Niemiecki zaawansowany - nauka języka dla tych, którzy chcą codziennie doskonalić swoje umiejętności Dostępne są też dwa widgety do nauki niemieckiego: - Słówko dnia po niemiecku - Słownik niemiecki Wyrażenia posegregowane są w lekcje i testy, które pozwalają uczyć się sukcesywnie. Opcja wstępnego ukrywania znaczenia słów niemieckich po polsku pomaga w zapamiętywaniu. Oprócz nauki według lekcji możliwe jest losowanie słówek. Słówka niemieckie mogą być odczytywane przez lektora. Program może służyć za mobilne fiszki, a także poręczny podręcznik do języka niemieckiego. Kurs niemieckiego dla początkujących i zaawansowanych teraz masz zawsze pod ręką. Aplikacja od polskiego start-upu Tweeba działa zarówno w trybie online jak i offline. Pliki danych głosowych (niemiecki lektor) najlepiej instalować z użyciem wifi. Nie czekaj - aplikacja jest lekka, szybko się instaluje i naprawdę pomaga w edukacji! Odkryj język niemiecki już dziś! German language for free with the application http://www.uczsiejezyka.pl Learning German is easy and fun! Download now for free German language course and learn the language with our help :) Free mobile app allows you to explore on your smartphone and tablet: - Words and phrases in German (German flashcards) - German grammar - Tests from German - German Dictionary, arrays, and pulls the most important topics Application to the German covers topics such as: Basics of the German language - greetings, greetings, farewells, phone, numbers, days, months, seasons, colors German colloquial - German phrasebook, diagrams sentences, questions about health, entertainment, fun, games, tests German school - class, objects, science, baccalaureate, graduate German for work - games, conversation recruitment, personal data German business - money, vocabulary, banking, insurance, investment German for tourists and expatriates - directions, location, location, life abroad Advanced German - language learning for those who want to improve their skills every day There are also two widgets to learn German: - Word of the day in German - German Dictionary Expressions are segregated lessons and tests that allow you to learn successfully. Initial option of hiding the meaning of the words of the German Polish helps in remembering. In addition to learning of lessons you can draw words. German words can be read by the teacher. The program can serve as a mobile notepad, as well as a handy guide to the German language. German course for beginners and advanced now you have always at hand. Application of Polish start-drop Tweeba works both online and offline. Voice data files (German teacher) is best installed using wifi. Do not wait - the application is lightweight, quick to install and really helps in education! Discover the German language today!

description: Play authentic video poker just like the casino. Jolly Card Video Poker is old gamble Poker machine. It's intended for all who like playing slot machine poker. Default BET value is 10. BET might be changed only before new DEAL. Players can change BET value between 1 and 99 tapping on it. On long tap (tap and hold about 3 seconds) the BET dialog will show. Auto Hold feature automatically puts the desired cards on hold. Therefore the player automatically plays according to the optimal strategy. Players can switch Auto Hold feature ON or OFF tapping on it. - - - - - - v.1.2 - Enabled BET value up to 99. Long tap (tap and hold about 3 seconds) the BET dialog will show. - Fixed issue with Street and Street Flush (ex. 8-9-10-J-Q) v.1.1 - Joker card was fully implemented.
release_text: v.1.3 - Moved main (green) button in the same line as gamble (red) buttons. - Issues reported by users were fixed.

description: Kids Train Tap is an engaging app for kids in which kids are controlling the various actions of train by tapping the controls on the dashboard. 1) The train currently runs in 3 different tracks:- - Tokyo City - Sahara Desert - North Pole - New York City - Amazon Forest - Himalayas 2) Each track has different animal and bird, click on them to know their name. 3. Also, kids can have tons of fun by adding rain and snow falls. Flower showering is added by clicking rose button on top left. 4. The speedometer has needle that shows the speed of the train. 5. Train can be made to run faster or slower, bridges and barriers can be added to the tracks, amazing horn of train can be blown. Kids have fun with Train.
