Main Features: - Record movie and take picture in the following ways: (1) Protected (safer), (2) Unprotected or (3) Hidden (faster). - Spy camera through the Widgets: - Take pictures and record videos without opening the application screen. - Select the icon (mammoth, pen, penguin, transparent etc) and the label of the widget. - Hide/Displays WhatsApp photos and videos or any other folder from the Gallery. - Setting up Flash, rear and front camera, auto focus and vibration. - Take picture and record video by pressing the volume button. - Take consecutive pictures for a predetermined time or until the user click stop. - Record video for a predetermined time. - Lost your password? Recover it through your Dropbox account. You should have made a backup previously. - Use multiple passwords. You change your passwords at any time, but your protected files will be accessible only if you are logged in the corresponding password. - Use the AES encryption algorithm to protect the files. - List protected\unprotected\visible\hidden files from device\Dropbox. - Select\unselect files based on existing in Device\Dropbox. - Sort files by name, date, type and size. - Copy\Move to Server\Device, Protect\Unprotect, Delete and Share files. - View pictures and videos with or without subtitle, swipe, zoom, multi touch and rotate. - Hide application! The Crypt Photo icon is hidden and the application may be called by dialing 4444. - Overwrite, skip or rename files with the same name. - Filter files by folder and by visibility. - Automatic services of Upload, protect and hide files. - Detects pictures taken by the native camera and shows a decision-making screen. - PhotoCrypt Desktop ( http://goo.gl/RUwoUS ) allows you to protect\unlock your files directly from your computer (PC). How to do: take your protected files in PhotoCrypt folder on your device or download the protected files form your Dropbox account to your computer and unprotect using PhotoCrypt Desktop.

Carry all the latest international and county cricket scores, ecb.co.uk cricket news, photos and videos with you wherever you go with the ECB Cricket Android application. This app allows you to follow all England matches at home and overseas, every countries' international Test and ODI fixtures, as well as your favourite county side while you are on the move. Personalise the fixtures to get the scores from the matches and competitions you really want to follow. And get push alerts as wickets fall from the matches of your choice. The scoreboard functionality gives you up-to-the-minute scores, plus headline information including the totals of current batsmen, number of overs bowled and the fall of the last wicket. Swipe the screen to reveal full scorecards for all innings played, and any related tweets from the @ECB_cricket official Twitter feed. Now integrated into the News area, the video feeds give you the best of ecb.co.uk/video - with exclusive England interviews, match highlights from home international series, county features and LV= County Championship highlights of every game too. And you can also listen to weekly ECB Cricket Podcasts throughout the summer season. FEATURES - Live scores for England and county games, plus all Tests and ODIs worldwide, on the unique scoreboard interface - Detailed batting and bowling info on scorecards, plus scoring graphs for ODIs and T20 matches - Rotate app horizontally for extra batting and bowling detail on the scorecards - Personalisation: set the teams and competitions you want to follow - Advanced fixture lists of all games and results archives from all matches - Sign up for TwelfthMan for free in the Info tab for priority ticket windows and exclusive offers - Latest England, county, women’s, grassroots and world cricket news from ecb.co.uk - Photo galleries for individual matches and events with the ability to scroll and zoom images - Feed of all the ECB Cricket podcasts - Video feeds: England highlights and exclusive player interviews with all the best content from ecb.co.uk/video - plus LV= County Championship highlights throughout the summer - Push alerts: fall of wickets from the matches you chose to follow - England squads and individual player profiles - Social media integration and email functionality, plus links to ECB's Twitter and Facebook channels - Wallpapers: add some great cricketing photos to your desktop or lock screen - League tables for county competitions - Ticket purchase contacts and links for England and county matches in the Info tab
release_text: Changes made to the App to include: * Brand new design. * New faster data feeds. * Several bug fixes.

description: Since 1920, AMC has been the amazing place where movies want to play. Now, we’re bringing movie magic to your fingertips with the AMC Theatres app for Google Play. It’s the newest, most amazing way to find the closest theatre, get showtimes, buy tickets and browse exclusive content! If you’re an AMC Stubs member, then the app has extra perks for you. Use your phone as your AMC Stubs card, check your rewards balance, share your stubs on Facebook and more! Get VIP movie access and download our app now! Use our AMC amazing app to: • Preferred Home View – Easily set your home screen so when you open the app, it shows you want you want to see. Choose from movies, favorite theatres, or your AMC Stubs dashboard. • Find a Movie – Now with the ability to filter by amenities and swipe to see what’s playing. We’ve made it easy to see showtimes and getting a ticket takes a tap. Purchase tickets for a show today, or make sure you’re first in line for next week’s movie by buying tickets now. Find movies by your current location, favorite theatres, or zip code. You’ll also find movie synopses and trailers. Tap the heart to favorite movies. • Find a Theatre – Want to have an AMC amazing experience? Find the theatre closest to your location, or look up your favorite theatre. You can also search by zip code, or switch over to map view. Easily tap the star to add a theatre as a favorite. • AMC Stubs – If you’re a member, then your wallet must be getting heavy from the money you save on free concession upgrades. Leave your AMC Stubs card at home and use your phone instead. Plus, you can look through your online stubs collection, share your stubs on Facebook, check your rewards balance and more. • My Movies – No, you won’t actually own the movies that you add to this list, but you can find all the upcoming movies you want to see and get notified as soon as tickets go on sale. • Offers – Keep all AMC special offers at your fingertips so you’re always in-the-know and ready to save. Android Tablet Exclusives • Planning a hot date for a couple weeks from now? Want to know when that Jennifer Lawrence movie finally comes out? It’s easy to search for upcoming movie releases using the calendar view.
release_text: Thanks to all of your amazing feedback, we’ve made the app even easier to use. Now you can customize your home view, easily swipe between movies, and tap a showtime to buy a movie ticket. This is one of our largest updates in a while so be sure to read the tutorials and play around a bit. If you have any questions or issues send us feedback under settings so we can help you right away. As usual we’ve squashed some bugs and made some changes to improve the overall performance of the app!

description: ¡Descubre las mejores palabras de amor para sorprender a tu media naranja en San Valentín! Las experiencias de otros que pasaron por lo que tú pasas ahora te pueden servir de consejos o inspirar. MUY SENCILLA DE USAR Y MUCHAS OPCIONES PARA COMPARTIR! La aplicación es muy sencilla de usar y te permite pasar de una reflexión a la siguiente con un gesto. Si encuentras una frase que te guste y quieres compartirla lo puedes hacer tocando la pantalla y eligiendo el medio. Las frases se pueden enviar por correo electrónico o SMS, postear en facebook o twittear. ENVÍANOS TUS PALABRAS Si te sientes inspirado por favor envíanos tus palabras. Vamos a considerar todas las que recibamos y distribuirlas en la próxima actualización. Discover the best words of love to surprise your beloved on Valentine's Day! If you have broken your heart, you doubt your love or just are in love phrases are going to help. The experiences of others who went through what you spend now might give you some advice or inspire. VERY EASY TO USE AND MANY OPTIONS TO SHARE! The application is very simple to use and allows you to move from one thought to the next with a gesture. If you find a phrase that you like and want to share what you can do by tapping the screen and choosing the middle. The phrases can be sent via email or SMS, post on facebook or twitter. SEND US YOUR WORDS If you feel inspired please send your words. We will consider all we receive and distribute them in the next update.
release_text: Sorprende a tu media naranja con nuevas frases y palabras de amor en este San Valentin Si disfrutas de la aplicación y nos quieres ayudar, por favor déjanos una valoración y una opinión. ¡Nos será muy útil para brindarte mejores actualizaciones! Muchas gracias. 4.0.6 -Mejoras en la velocidad y el rendimiento. -Corrección de errores menores.

description: Kids Math - Kindergarten takes a creative approach to teaching math for kids in Kindergarten. Colorful and interactive activities will encourage kids to learn essential math concepts in a fun way. The app offers the following features 1) Numbers In this activity kids will recognize and learn numbers from 1 - 30 2) Match Number This activity is a memory game which involves numbers 3) Following activities uses Number Line to rearrange numbers * Ascending order * Descending order * Missing Number Kids have to fill in the missing numbers. The numbers need to be arranged in Ascending as well as Descending order. 6) Find the Number This is a quiz activity to identify numbers 7) Picture Counting - Children add by counting the objects and write only the sums Fish counting - Interesting way to learn counting with fish. 8) Spelling Bubbles - Fun way to learn the spelling of numbers 9) Our picture addition worksheets are perfect for children who are just learning to add. 10) Time This activity helps kids to learn/tell time

MightyMeeting is the best way to share presentations and drawings in the classroom, boardroom, or online meetings. PowerPoint presentations and PDF documents can be stored in your private and secure online content repository, downloaded to your Android tablet, and opened anywhere, even when your device is not connected to the Internet. You can quickly switch between presentations or jump to any slide in a presentation. You can annotate slides with drawings. You can also create an interactive whiteboard and use it to draw diagrams or write mathematical equations. Documents and drawings can be shared with an unlimited number of people in online meetings. A meeting attendee can join via tablet, phone, or any other device with a web browser. Online sharing works over 3G, 4G, and Wi-Fi networks. At the end of a meeting, you can email slides, annotations, and drawings as a PDF document. Here are just a few ways to use MightyMeeting: -Open a sales presentation and share it with a prospect locally or remotely -Take turns presenting slides and drawings in a team meeting -Brainstorm on product design ideas by drawing on a shared whiteboard -Control slides remotely and share the whiteboard in a boardroom meeting -Share mathematical formulas and diagrams with fellow researchers -Teach a class remotely and share slides and drawings with your students MightyMeeting is a free service. Free account holders can share documents with up to six pages. An in-app purchase is available to remove this limit. Use MightyMeeting today to engage your audience and transform a one-way presentation into a collaborative experience. Make Every Meeting a Mighty Meeting.

Met meer dan 1,2 miljoen leden is de KNVB de grootste sportbond van een Nederland. Wekelijks speelt dan ook een groot aantal leden van deze bond een uitwedstrijd. Speciaal voor hen is de app zoekVoetbalclub ontwikkeld waarmee alle voetbalclubs in Nederland te vinden zijn. Met deze app kunnen adressen worden gezocht van alle (amateur)voetbalclubs in Nederland. Via twee zoekingangen (op clubnaam en op plaatsnaam) kan eenvoudig worden gezocht waar een club is gesitueerd. Behalve adresgegevens wordt binnen een kaart de ligging getoond van desbetreffende club. Verder worden de kleuren van het tenue en de datum van oprichting van de club getoond. Via de navigatiebutton kan de route naar de club worden bepaald. Met de call-button wordt het telefoonnummer van de club gebeld. Ook kan de website van de club worden weergegeven. Verder kan op basis van de huidige GPS-locatie worden bepaald welke voetbalclubs (op dat moment) in de buurt liggen. Functies: - Zoek op naam voetbalclub. - Zoek naar voetbalclub op plaatsnaam. - Routenavigatie naar voetbalclubs met GoogleMaps - Binnen een GoogleMaps-kaart wordt aangegeven waar een voetbalclub is gesitueerd. - Huidige locatie wordt weergegeven op basis van de GPS-coördinaten. De dichtstbijzijnde clubs worden binnen de kaart getoond en kan meteen informatie van worden opgevraagd. - Met één klik direct telefoonnummer bellen vanuit gepresenteerde clubgegevens - Direct naar site club - Kleuren tenue van club - Datum oprichting club With more than 1.2 million members is the largest sports organization of the KNVB Netherlands. Weekly plays therefore a large number of members of this union an away game. Specially developed for them the app search football club which to find all football clubs in the Netherlands. This app allows addresses to be searched for all (amateur) football clubs in the Netherlands. Through two search entries (on club name and location) can be easily searched where a club is situated. Except address is shown the location of relevant club. Within a map Furthermore, the colors of the uniform and the date of establishment of the club displayed. The navigation button the route can be determined to the club. The call button is called the number of the club. Also, the website of the club are displayed. Furthermore, based on the current GPS position to determine which football clubs (at that time) are nearby. Features: - Search by name football. - Search by city name football. - Route Navigation with Google Maps to football - Within a Google Map shows where a football club is situated. - Current location is displayed based on the GPS coordinates. The nearest clubs are displayed inside the card information and can immediately be requested. - One click direct phone call from club presented data - Go to club website - Colors of dress club - Established club
release_text: - verbetering functionaliteiten - aanpassingen vormgeving - bugs fixed

description: Airliners.net is the largest online aviation community in the world. description: ** Over 70,000 Downloads! ** Think you might be pregnant? Stop worrying and learn the answer with the Pregnancy Test! Let us help you to answer the ‘am I pregnant’ question. No two women experience pregnancy the same way, but there are certain symptoms (pregnancy symptoms) that are a good indication you're pregnant. How does it work? Pregnancy Test asks you a series of straightforward questions about the date of your last period and when you last had sexual intercourse. Then you get the chance to check off all the symptoms you're experiencing, like fatigue or morning sickness. It’s like a quick pregnancy quiz. The pregnancy app takes the information and runs it through a proven algorithm to determine the likelihood that you're pregnant. This free pregnancy test can be taken whenever and however often as you’d like. Take the test as early as the first day of your missed period. All the information you provide is kept completely confidential. Please remember: This application should not replace the care of a trained physician. Only your doctor can say for sure if you're pregnant.

Though the screenshots in Russian, English version is present. This program is designed for recording dreams upon awakening. If you practice lucid dreaming or want to learn it or just want to remember their dreams - this program is for you. Dream tries to escape from the memory, and if it did not immediately write down, then it will be too difficult to remember. In the application there are 2 ways to enter information: text and voice (voice recorder). Waking up at night, you may not want to turn on the lights, take a pen and write down a dream in a notebook. With this application, you can dial a dream on a telephone keypad, while dictating to the recorder. Later, you can listen to these records and retype the text. Voice recordings are stored attached to the record is the dream to which they relate. The application contains two icons to launch: the first - this is normal start, the second - for a quick start recording at the one touch (put this icon on the main screen for easy access at night. Provides the function of dreams in the export xml-file, which can later be converted to the correct format (for example, to import into another application for recording dreams). Sound recordings are in the public folder you can copy to your computer. What if you set a password and forgot it? DreamRecorder not asking for a password from 4:00 am to 5:00 am. Wake up at that time and change the password.

Looking for a house? Trovit! All properties in one place- on the go! Looking for an apartment, house, flat or studio to rent? Checking out homes for sale? Find them on Trovit! Experience Trovit's powerful home search engine on your Android phone. Every day, Trovit Homes delivers new ads of all kinds of properties (house, apartment, studio, condo, ranch, farmhouse, penthouse, cottage...) to rent or on sale. Search for homes close to your current location or in the location of your choice, enter keywords to see what properties match your search or easily sign up for email alerts to be notified whenever new properties are added. You can even draw a line to search for properties along a street, or draw an area to see all available properties within it. It doesn't matter what kind of property you're looking for: house, apartment, studio, condo, ranch, farmhouse, penthouse, cottage- you'll find all types of real estate on Trovit Homes. The Trovit Homes app lets you search for property in all 46 Trovit countries. KEY FUNCTIONALITIES: ✔ Location is important: See all listings displayed on the map. ✔ Find the perfect home: Filter home listings by location, neighbourhood and property type. ✔ Save your picks: Did you find the perfect house or apartment? Save property ads as favourites. ✔ Retrieve your recent home searches: Recent home searches are saved for easier access. ✔ Be social: Send interesting property ads by email or share them on social networks. ✔ Support in refining search: App shows terms related to your house search so you can find even more interesting houses. ✔ Choose your view mode: View results in grid view or list view. COMMENTS & IDEAS? We'd love to hear your feedback! Email us anytime: mobile@trovit.com http://homes.trovit.co.uk
release_text: We now show suggested properties based on what you've already visited.

Hi!! Please note that WinterSun is in beta and still being developed with help from the community! If something doesn't work like you would want, then please join the forums :-) WinterSun is an MMORPG (multi player online role playing game) with a retro 2d style for Android and is currently being actively improved upon by the developer! You can run around killing other players or NPCs via PvP, chat to other players using the online chat function and also level up your character, including battling other factions, and do some quests using the new questing system Winter Sun has large maps to explore and also features dungeons, clans, and different factions. Will you be a druid bent on the destruction of the realm, a knight of the Protectorate charged with rooting out all evil and destroying it, or a Monster causing destruction and chaos wherever you go?! The MMO will support instances and equip screens (so you can wear armour, swords, etc) Please note that there may be some bugs whilst it is being developed, and things that don't work. At the moment you can 'chat' to other players and kill things, go inside the shop and buy and sell things (there is no auction house,... yet!) Feel free to mail suggestions to the developer link on where you want the RPG to go - I have yet to do things like a instance system so there is an opportunity to help sculpt what the game is going to be!

description: *** Public Open Beta *** Updates: - Crash fix for Google Music - Android 4.3 support - Native Support for Zooper, UCCW and minimalistic text. When enabled the following variables are made available without the need for Tasker. MU_ALBUM - Album name MU_ARTIST - Artist name MU_TRACK - Track name MU_COVERART - Path to Bitmap containing current coverart MU_ISPLAYING - 1 if playing 0 if not MU_CURR_APP - Current media app "pretty" name MU_CURR_PACKAGE - Current media app package name - Rewrote direct mode from scratch. Should be far more reliable now. - Added new option to launch music application if Android killed it or it is not currently running. Will launch when user attempt to control a dead music application. - Added Pebble watch support. Check out the reviews: - http://droidhorizon.com/media-utilities-beta-review/ - http://galaxy-note2.wonderhowto.com/how-to/control-all-your-music-apps-from-single-widget-your-samsung-galaxy-note-2-0146583/ - http://www.xda-developers.com/android/take-control-of-multiple-players-with-generic-music-controls/ Other links https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/107139153057065253112 www.blackbearblanc.dk Description: Media Utilities NOT a music player but a collection of widgets, notifications and tasker plugins that works with you media players. Media Utilities automatically determines your current music application and integrates with it providing seamless integration to simplify your life. Widgets: Media Utilities provides over 10 widgets each with a different looks and feel and most of them configurable to your specific tastes. Widgets show track, artist, album and coverart for the current music application no configuration required, seamlessly showing information from Pandora to Spotify in a single widget. Widget configuration: - Background color (transparency, gradient) - Border color - Border width - Several button skins to match your personal taste - Show/Hide buttons based on need - More all the time Tasker: Media Utilities provides both state and action plugins to allow you dream up your own applications without having to deal with figuring out how to control each individual music application. Plugins: - State – Is playing whenever music is currently playing - State – Is Not playing whenever music is paused/stopped - State – Notify when play state is changed - State – Notify when any metadata is changed. (play state, track , artist, album) - State – Notify when track is changed but not when play state changes. - State – Notify when current music application is changed - Action – Play/Pause – Simulates play/pause for current music application - Action – Play – Simulates play for current music application - Action – Play (Smart) – Simulates the action of a play command without doing a play command for current music application - Action – Pause– Simulates pause for current music application - Action – Pause (Smart) – Simulates the action of a pause command without doing a play command for current music application - Action – Next – Simulates next for current music application - Action – Previous – Simulates previous for current music application - Action – Current Media – opens the current music application Notification: Media Utilities provides notification controls that automatically control your current media application. Features: - Configurable buttons and look and feel - Automatically shows when a music application starts playing - Optionally only shown for music applications that don’t already have notification controls for example Pandora. - Behavior is configurable to match your specific needs
release_text: >> Latest Version (152) - 4.4 KitKat support >> Version (126) - Crashfix for Google Music >> Version (116) - Added Android 4.3 support - Performance/Stability fixes - Icons from Black Bear Blanc >> Version (104) - Native Support for Zooper, UCCW and minimalistic text. - Rewrote direct mode from scratch. - New launch if dead option >> Version (97) - Stability fixes - Added hidden widget support - Added Vertical alignment to widgets

Tourism Toronto is excited to offer our See Toronto app, in partnership with Toronto Star, to enhance your visit to Toronto, Mississauga and Brampton. Get the inside scoop on Canada's largest metropolis and tips on all the exciting things to see and do while you are here all year round. The app includes easy-to-search comprehensive listings for events, dining, attractions and shopping. We hope you enjoy your visit! Note: The information in the app is accurate, to the best of our abilities. Tourism Toronto is not liable should information about hours and prices of the individual businesses change. About Tourism Toronto & Toronto Star Tourism Toronto is the official destination marketing organization for Toronto’s tourism industry, operating in partnership with the Ontario Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Sport. Tourism Toronto (otherwise known as Toronto Convention and Visitors Association) focuses on promoting and selling Greater Toronto as a remarkable destination for tourists, convention delegates, and business travellers. Officially operating as a not-for-profit agency, Tourism Toronto has over 1,200 members and is a partnership of public and private sector organizations. Tourism Toronto is provincially designated Regional Tourism Organization #5, representing the cities of Toronto, Mississauga and Brampton. This app was developed by Tourism Toronto, with funding provided by the Government of Ontario. The Toronto Star is Canada’s highest-circulation daily newspaper, and also owns toronto.com; a top website that offers comprehensive information about Toronto. Together, Tourism Toronto and Toronto Star have teamed up to offer you the Tourism Toronto app which draws upon the up-to-date comprehensive content from Toronto Star and Toronto.com, and is supplemented by exclusive information from the membership database of Tourism Toronto.

This Set is made of 8 skins !! - 1st is a nice weather widget, others are Big Icons (set them up the way you like), - Messages / Calls notifications count ! UCCW's developer do all is best for you to enjoy the Gmail notifications count soon. This Gmail icon (and others) will be integrated in next updates ----------------------------------------------- Required ----------------------------------------------- UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/TZgw0 I recommand you use a Launcher app like Nova (Light and fast launcher) to give you more flexibility with widgets sizing on the homescreen (and other stuff like overlay, etc). ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Install : ----------------------------------------------- 1 - Once you've downloaded/installed the skin, 2 - Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you're running a launcher or via appdrawer if you're on stock ROM), 3 - When UCCW skins' list pops up, choose the downloaded skin to apply, 4 - Touch the pic 5 - Enjoy :) repeat steps 2, 3, 4 and 5 if you add another skin. ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Use hotspots (new) : ----------------------------------------------- UCCW Skins can provide hotspots (or not) : This one got a lot of hotspots. For the hotspots to work, in UCCW menu, turn Hotspot Mode ON. ----------------------------------------------- Tips ----------------------------------------------- - In the UCCW menu, if skin downloaded got a location and/or weather element, set the location to auto (if it's enable, then disable and enable it again for the location to work properly). - In UCCW skin's list, long press a skin to delete it, In some rare case your skin may not sho up in the UCCW skin list since there's a new encryption feature introduced in Jelly Bean. Google Play uses feature while installing skins. All third party themes and similar PAID apps like Beautiful widgets, Go launcher etc, are affected by this new encryption. If your are experiencing similar issue, please do not give this skin a bad rate, contact-me first ;) ----------------------------------------------- FYI : Visit my xda thread and download it for free (*.uzip) http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1700008 -----------------------------------------------

Pure news widget is a scrollable widget for news reading (Rss/Atom) compatible with Feedly and your own RSS list (OPML) . Note : since Google service ends (July 1rst), Pure news widget will sync with Feedly service. WARNING: This is a scrollable widget which REQUIRE Android 3.x/4.x device or ADW Launcher, Launcher Pro, LiveHome, Go Launcher Ex. If you don't use a Launcher supporting scrollable widgets, it won't work. Features: - Use phone credentials to login to Google Reader. No password (for Android > 2.0). - Connected to Google reader to retrieve your prefered news, or get your feeds from your own RSS feed list in text format (OPML) - Scrollable widget with most alternative launchers like ADW, LiveHome, Go Launcher, LauncherPro or Android 3.x/4.x - Click on a news title to open the full story in the browser or in internal viewer (works in offline mode too !) - Show news thumbnails - Multiples skins (including fully transparent) and widgets sizes to make a fancy widget - Lot of options to customize rendering - Can use Google Mobilizer to reduce used bandwidth when reading full article - Support Google Reader mark as read - Optional local cache of articles - Can restrict sync to Wifi connection - Support multi-widget with as many feeds as you want - Support Android up to 4.4 (ICS / KitKAt ...) A problem ? Please, mail me for support. If you have issues with disappearing widgets on Samsung devices, please read this: http://goo.gl/woDKcx

A cat, a jetpack, and robot monsters! Pilot Jetpack Cat as he takes to the skies in this arcade-style shooter. Blast the evil robot enemies and collect power ups to fly as high as possible. Along the way, make sure to collect crystals and circuits to upgrade your abilities and trigger the powerful boost mode! Log in with Facebook to see your friends' scores and compete against them! Jetpack Cat is a heroic cat stranded on an unknown planet, but luckily enough he still has a jetpack to escape with. Help guide Jetpack Cat away from a dangerous planet full of deadly robot aliens. If you're lucky, Jetpack Cat might even reach outer space! - 100% FREE! No annoying energy or waiting to play. Support our small studio with completely optional in-app purchases. - Modern twist on the retro arcade shooter gameplay. Inspired by classic games like Galaga and Space Invaders. - Beautiful and intricate graphics - Avoid and destroy robots to fly Jetpack Cat as high as possible - Six enemies and mini-bosses - Choose your upgrades and equipment well... Jetpack Cat won't last long without them! - Collect power-ups to gain powerful temporary abilities - Use boosters to gain an edge over enemies and fly Jetpack Cat even higher - Show your skills and compete with friends using Facebook and Twitter connectivity Do you see any issues? We'd love to hear from you! Please email us at support@makeorbreakgames.com Follow us on Twitter: @mob_games

description: 燃費計算アプリ 　簡単操作で給油時に値をセットしておくと、　燃費の状態がわかり、ドライブも楽しくなります ・毎回の給油時に値をセットして、燃費を計算します ・満タンチェックで過去の満タン日から正確な燃費を計算します ・メーター計をリセットしたときは、リセットした時点から計算します ・過去（一年前まで）のデータも設定出来、並べ替えて表示します 燃費計算V2アプリを公開しました 　V2では入力画面とデータリストの画面を分けました。 　最後に入力したデータのみを表示する画面もあります 　指で横スライドして、画面を進めることができます Fuel consumption calculation application If you leave the set value during fueling by simple operation, to understand the state of the fuel consumption, drive will also be fun • Set the value during fueling of every time, and then calculate the fuel consumption · We will calculate the exact fuel consumption from full tank of day past full tank check • When you reset the meter gauge, is calculated from the time of the reset · It can also set the data (up to one year ago) past and displays the sort I was released the fuel consumption calculation V2 app  I have divided the list screen of data input and screen in V2. There is also a screen that displays only the data that was entered last You can then slide your finger side, to advance the screen

description: Originally released on PC in 1994, Little Big Adventure (also known as 'Relentless: Twinsen's Adventure') is an action-adventure RPG designed by Frédérick Raynal. 20 years later, a new version of this entertaining video game hit is being released, specially adapted for mobile phones. You play as Twinsen, a young hero living on Citadel Island on a world under the heel of the dictator Dr. FunFrock. You’ve been having strange dreams in which your planet is about to be destroyed. These dreams don’t make Dr. FunFrock particularly happy, and he locks you away in an insane asylum. As Twinsen, you’ll need to escape from your cell and discover your incredible destiny as a descendant of a long line of magicians in charge of protecting your planet’s secret! Return to the original world of Twinsen or discover it for the first time with the touchscreen version, which incorporates brand new features: • New gameplay adapted to ' touch' mode, adjustable throwing and jumping distance (visible trajectory), simplified sections, etc… • Streamlined, easy-to-use interface • Tutorials at the start of the game • Dynamic ON/OFF hint system • Zoom feature to provide an overview of the scenes • Automatic save system, with return to the last checkpoint when you lose a life • 5 languages available: English, French, German, (voices and text) - Italian and Spanish (text only, voices in English). • Over 15 hours of gameplay • A rich and varied blend of platform, combat and puzzle gaming • An entire planet with dozens of different locations to discover With an epic story, quality puzzles and hundreds of characters and dialogues, Little Big Adventure is a masterpiece of the genre. MAJOR UPDATE 05/2014 • Improved and simpler pathfinding • New optional control scheme: virtual Pad • New manual saving mode (Area based checkpoints) • Game controllers now supported (MOGA, M.O.J.O, and more) • Controller support for NVIDIA SHIELD and Android set-top boxes. • Minor bug fixes

description: "500px is a photographic community powered by creative people from all over the world that lets you share and discover inspiring photographs." ( http://500px.com/ ) 500px Land is an Android application, giving you access to this fast growing community. It uses the 500px API to browse the lists of most popular, editors' choice, upcoming, fresh, your friends, your favorites, and your photographs. You don't have to be a member of 500px to use this application, but you have to be to use all the features. You will also need to give the app access to browse your friends lists, your favorites, and your photographs. The photographs may contain some tasteful nudity. There is a setting in the application to show the risque content. It's disabled by default. If you install this application on a tablet, it will use the additional display space by aligning the photos in a grid. Holding a photo in the list will bring up a menu with additional options. YOu must be logged in to take advantage of this feature. This application uses the 500px(tm) API and is not endorsed or certified by 500px or 500px Inc. All 500px Trademarks displayed on this application are property of 500px Inc. All photographs are property of their respective owners.
release_text: New in 1.2: * Tablet friendly layout if using a large-screen device * Local cache for photos, making the application start up faster and reducing data transfer * Context menu, popping up when holding a photo in the list * Fix a crash during network timeout while voting * Small improvements and speed optimizations throughout

description: Pro Version ** without ** ads ** Please try the free version first ** Camera Gif Creator allows you to create animated images (GIF) using the camera or pictures you already have on your mobile. Once you have chosen your settings you can block them. Just press the menu button or touch the sub menu in the top bar and check "Block Settings". Press the camera icon and make the photos that you want. If your camera application has the burst option please try it. Once you're done press the back button and the Gif will be created in seconds. The gallery below displays GIFs. Hold down the image to view it. In the gallery you can select other photos and create more GIFs. Just choose the order and click the button creation. You also have the options delete and share. Browse inside the gallery thanks to the explorer bar and the back button. If you want to go to the settings screen just press the back icon on the top bar. ---------------- FAQ: - When I back from camera does not create GIF! Try to exit the application and re-enter. It is also possible that your phone is in low memory and "kill" the photo detector. - I can not find my GIFS! Generally GIFs are stored on your SD card or internal memory in the folder "Pictures/CameraGifCreator" - When I try to view a GIF, application stops! Surely the GIF either too large for your mobile. Select it, press to share and mail for viewed. - I can not see properly the images in the gallery! The first time you go into a folder with images may take awhile. Be patient. The charging time depends on the size of the images to load. - Where is my SD card in Gallery! I'm lost! Usually in /root/mnt/scard and camera shots in DCIM. - When I share my GIFS via Whatsapp or Line I can not play them! Whatsapp and Line reencode all the images that you send. It's not my fault. ---------------- Thanks for buy/try this app. Atre. www.atredroid.net

app_name: Learn to tell time - Fun Clock
developer: SAVIVO - Where Education Comes to Life
description: ★★★★★ A fun, safe and easy way for you kid to learn the analog clock. ★★★★★ Made famous by the award winning educational company Mingoville.com Give your child a winning head start in telling time with Fun Clock. An educational learning app created by award-winning games developer Mingoville! The first story is FREE for you to try with your child. This app includes possibilities for In-app purchases. A Captivating ‘Task-Oriented’ Game Design: + Eye-catching, appealing and safe e-learning environment + Cute animated characters that will “speak” to your child + An effective ‘learn-through-play’ educational philosophy + Strengthens both listening and pronunciation capabilities + Excellent supplementary teaching tool for teachers/tutors Fun and Engaging ‘Learner-focused’ Game Features: + Fun and cute animation characters. + Animation movie showing the relationship between the analogue clock and the digital clock + Real voice actors with more than a 1000 audio files + Learn Hours, half hours, quarters and minutes. + Level scores to keep track of improvement. + Certificate – your child kid earn certificate if all levels are completed. It can be mailed or shared to others. + Great handdrawn graphics + Mute function for background sounds Games included: + Learn to build your own clock + Talking clock + Learn to set the time and move the hands to tell time + Choose the right clock to make the bus depart + Tilt the smartphone or tablet to move the numbers to the right position on the clock This App is not like any other “telling time app”. Apart from learning your child to practice with some exercises, it also contains storytelling explaining how the clock works and it includes funny animations. Take the first steps to learn to tell time and download the Free Fun Clock app now!

Find out what's really happening in that missing third of your life... Smart Cycle Alarm + Movement Tracker + Sound Recorder + Sleep Debt Log + Data Analysis + Trend Graphs + Sleep Help + Auto-Wifi/Silence/Airplane modes + Export + Sync to mysleepbot.com The completely new Sleepbot is finally here! We’ve spent months developing a beautiful, intuitive sleep cycle tracker and dependable optimal alarm that lets you customize your sleep tracking. Record your movements and sounds during the night and wake up better each morning during light sleep. - Set and customize multiple alarms for your partner, as alerts - Easily customize smart alarm, motion tracking, sound recording options - Simple punch-in using widget, options for auto-silence and airplane mode - Includes quick solutions to fall asleep and stay awake - Set a automatic alarm to wake up. - Set a reminder for you to go to sleep. Sleepbot now contains the most comprehensive sleep analysis on the market— - Tap detailed motion/sound graphs to play back sleep talk, snores, etc. - Direct comparison between movement and sound correlations - Trend graphs (length, sleep/wake times, pattern) to see your sleep quality over time - Review your sleep statistics, debt log, and averages - Never lose your sleep data – automatic backup to view and share at mysleepbot.com Sleepbot is the only sleep application that includes: motion and sound graphs, sleep debt log, statistics, trend graphs (averages, sleep/wake times, patterns), multiple custom alarms, resources to help you fall asleep and stay awake and is completely free! *** Supported by: ~ Gentle Alarm ~ Relax & Sleep ~ Tasker SleepBot is recognized by the United States National Institute of Health and the National Academy of Engineering as the First Place Winner of "Go Viral To Improve Health" competition. **Note: New permissions. Google Account permission allows us to let you sign up and login using your Google Account. Read Phone state allow users to punch in online and deliver the message to the right phone with the right account. Explanation of all permissions: http://developer.mysleepbot.com/why-permissions Thanks for your patience-- we made it and couldn't have done it without you!! This is our first version with smart alarm and tracking options, so please let us know if there are any problems and how we can improve. Again, thanks to our users and more updates soon! :) - SleepBot Team http://www.mysleepbot.com http://twitter.com/sleepbot http://facebook.com/sleepbot

Get your sushi on with Gogo Sushi! As fresh and addictive as sushi itself, Gogo Sushi puts you on the other side of the sushi bar. To defend the honor of your grandfather’s family restaurant against the underpriced wiles of the sushi-slinging supermarket next door, you must get every order right, satisfy every appetite, and even read your customers’ minds! Be a true tap-tap tycoon! Gogo Sushi is simple, satisfying, elegant and fun—like a hit sushi restaurant! Your success depends upon your ability to satisfy each customer—the hungry, the picky, and even the indecisive! Memorize their likes and dislikes, keep a close eye on when to lay off the wasabi and when to slather it on, and don’t keep anyone waiting! When you bring smiles to the faces of the sushi-craving, you’ll be rewarded by making big bucks in “fishes.” Spend these wisely at the local market, and you’ll well-prepared to battle price wars and appetites to make your family’s restaurant the most popular on the block! ::::::REVIEWS:::::: iPhonelife.com: "You'll be hooked quick" iPhoneGlance.com: "Gogo Sushi is fun and elegant" Appbite.com: "An addictive game" Appyzilla.com: "Will keep you engaged with it's wondrous gameplay" TheiPhoneappreview.com: "enough quality gameplay offered here to keep any fan of the genre engaged" Mobers.org: "If you are looking for a simple game to kill the time GoGo Sushi might be for you" Gogaminggiant.com: "perfect pacing and plenty of content justify the pricetag" Topiphoneresource: "there are oodles of levels and the game has good replay potential" AppsJam.com: "Gogo Sushi is a quick, cheap, and thrilling way to dive into cooking action on your iPhone." Features: · Tutorial Learn your way around the sushi bar with a detailed tutorial that outlines the assembly sequence for of each type of sushi, how to buy fish in the shop, and the importance of other items · Special Items Improve the ambience in your restaurant—as well as your performance—with special in game items. Items can make customers more patient, keep sushi fresher for a longer period of time, keep tips flowing by having customers stay longer, and so forth. · Bonus Items Aim for perfection! When you get a perfect score and achieve special combos, you’ll be rewarded with beautiful and functional bonus items from the market owner! Earn six sets of six premium items each to enhance your restaurant, and become a master chef! · Game Center Integration Show off your perfect scores and your beautiful restaurant to friends and competitors—who is a true sushi tycoon? ★ Play Video http://youtu.be/h8NrSI4pZh4 ★ Q and A - The speech bubble with question mark and fish. Each customer has 3 favorite sushi. After the customer eats sushi, the heart effect shows up, that is its favorite sushi. Basically, they eat all types of sushi at that time. However, if they eat their favorite’s one, you can get more tips than others who order the same one. Remember, which sushi customer likes. - The speech bubble with question mark with conveyer belt If customer wants to eat the fish which is on the conveyer belt, they have it. If there are sushi on conveyer belt, they will eat it immediately. Tip!!! Set the sushi where the customer eats fasteron conveyer belt. - If you get "Excellent" on a game, you'll get a special gift 'which can be items or fish' from market owner. - The game reset It's the left button in Setting Screen. Attention!! if you tab reset button, all of data will be lost. (Items and money etc) E-mail: help@ozgnahc.com Homepage: http://ozgnahc.com Twitter : http://twitter.com/ozgnahc Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/ozgnahc

Spades is a partnership card game played with 4 players in two partnership. It's played with a standard 52 card deck. Ace is high, 2 is low. The object of the game is to first reach 500 points. Partners sit across the table from each other. A dealer is randomly selected and then each player takes turn to be the dealer in a clockwise direction. In this game, you play against 3 robots, one being your partner while the other two are your opponents. To play the game, 1) On the Welcome page, you choose either a slow or quick mode of play and then click button Start. 2) You are assigned as the dealer for the first hand. Each player is dealt 13 cards one at a time. 3) The player to the dealer's left bids first and then continue clockwise. You before seeing your cards has an option to click button Double Nil to bid “Double Nil” which means you don't expect to win any trick for the hand. If you or your partner bid Double Nil, you and your partner can exchange 3 cards by pressing 3 cards and click button Exchange. If you don't want to bid Double Nil, you see your cards by clicking button Bid+1 and then keep on clicking Bid+1 to come to the number of tricks you expect to win and then click button Play. A player can bid from 0 (Nil) to 13. If you have a long click at button Bid+1 it's will reduce the bidding by 1. There is only one round of bidding. It is legal for both partners to bid Nil or Double Nil. If both partners bid Double Nil, there is no card exchange. This game tries to figure out if you have a good chance to bid Double Nil, if not it will automatically let you see your cards and starting bidding. 4) The player to the dealer's left then leads a card of any suit except spade. He/she can lead a spade when there are only spade suit cards in the hand or a spade card has been played. Play continues clockwise. Each player has to play a card in the same suit which was led. When a player runs out of card in the same suit he/she can play a spade or any other suit. Each trick is won by the player who played the highest rank of the suit led. However if spades are played the trick is won by the highest rank of spade. You play a card by press at it and then click button Play. 5) The player who won a trick then set the trick face down in front of him. He/she then leads the next card which can be any suit except spade. A spade can only be led if it has been played before by other players. 6) The play continues until each player runs out of cards. 7) Each trick won counts for 10 points if a partnership meets its bid. Tricks won above the bid are called “bags” counts for 1 point. If a partnership does not meet its bid, it scores 10 negative points for each trick it bid. The bags are accumulated in a game. When a partnership has 10 bags, it get 100 negative points. Any bags beyond 10 bags are carried over to the next cycle. A player who bids Nil and is successful in winning no trick, the partnership earns 100 point. If the player wins any trick, the partnership loses 100 points. A player who bids Double Nil and is successful in winning no trick, the partnership earns 200 point. If the player wins any trick, the partnership loses 200 points. The usual rule is that when a nil fails, the tricks won by the nil bidder do not count towards making the partner's bid, but do count as bags for the team. 8) The game ends when a partnership reaches 500 points and has higher points than the other partnership win the game. When both partnerships has the same points, they play again until one has more points and become the winner. The game automatically bring you the next hand or next game.

Protect your digital life with IDrive! IDrive for Android securely backs up your mobile data with Private Key Encryption -- the highest level of data security available -- so only you can access your files. You can backup multiple devices to one account, and sync files across your devices to access your data from anywhere. IDrive introduces Local backup using the IDrive Wi-Fi device - a complementary solution to online backup. Local backup solves the biggest problem with cloud backup – slow restores. With local backup, you can restore your data really fast! Protect some of your data for free, or choose the IDrive Unlimited Mobile plan and get unlimited backup for up to 5 mobile devices for only $4.99 per year! Features: *Backup and Restore contacts, photos, videos, calendars, texts, apps, and documents (including .doc, .pdf, .zip and more) with a single tap. *Local backup for faster restores via the IDrive Wi-Fi device *Easily sync files between all linked devices. *Link your devices to a single account and access your data from anywhere. *Instagram and Facebook Backup. *Selectively backup and restore files. *Share files and folders over a single, secure link. *Automatic upload option protects your photos and videos as soon as they are taken via wifi or cellular data. *Schedule recurring backups by day and time. *Gallery View allows you to easily slide through all your pictures and videos. Security features: *256-bit AES encryption *Private key encryption ensures only you have access to your data *Lock app with a passcode *Easily unlink devices which are lost or stolen Information on permissions: *"Read and Edit your text messages" is required to backup and restore text messages. *"Network access, network and wi-fi connections" is required to reach wi-fi and cellular network for backing up your data. *"Read, add or modify Calendar Events" is required to backup and restore calendar. *To read/write Call Logs and Contacts is required to backup, access, and restore your call history and contacts. *"Read Phone" is required to get the device ID which helps distinguish your device. *"Accounts" is required for accessing Play Store for making in-app purchases. *"Prevent device from sleeping" is required so that device doesn't go to sleep while backup/restoring is being performed. *"Run at startup" is required to run scheduled backups.

description: Happy Easter !!! Babies and toddlers will love this eye-catching game. Its time to your babies to crack the beautiful easter eggs!!! And eat delicious cakes & ice creams !!! This game is amazingly relaxing and strangely addictive! Key for successful apps for your babies is the Simplicity. "Easter Fun for Babies" brings the beauty of the Easter to your tablets. It is extremely easy to play and super fun! Touch and Pop, that's it! There are lots of colourful eggs which will help your babies/toddlers to learn colours and shapes! At first time, it may be difficult to your toddlers and babies to correctly pop the moving eggs with his/her little hand. Play the Easter Fun for Babies game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days to educate them about how they could achieve to pop a egg. You will be surprised w/ the learning curve of your babies while they are playing w/ their small hands. It is suggested that Easter Fun for Babies game should be played in the presence of a mother or father, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When should your babies play! * When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying or you are not able to deal w/ them, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various easter eggs and their shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution: Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

This means you can brush up on your grammar and work on building an extensive vocabulary anywhere and at any time. Just imagine: you're sitting at home watching TV when a word pops up in Spanish or French. You reach for the foreign language dictionary but then think to yourself, "wouldn't it be better just to learn this language?" You return the dictionary to the shelf and whip out your smartphone. You enter the Google Play Store and search for "the best App for learning Spanish". Lo and behold, "Babbel" appears. Much more than just a vocabulary trainer or a grammar guide, Babbel offers 7,000 hours (yes, 7,000... And counting!) of language lessons lovingly composed by language experts, each interactive course packed full of grammar activities, vocabulary exercises and pronunciation training by way of intelligent speech recognition. And we offer all this for all levels: Are you a complete beginner? Intermediate? Advanced? Would you like to concentrate on French verb conjugation? Or would you like to do a Spanish tense review? Or do you need to discover what that Italian recipe from your great grandmother Nonna contains? Babbel's language tutorials are arranged thematically, enabling the easy navigation and selection of words and topics, so no more phrasebooks necessary.
release_text: We have shrunk down the size of the app. Now you can download only the learning content you require with one click. We’ve also added a fresh batch of new content.

description: Commander！ Over 64 campaigns in 4 battlefields are waiting for your challenge. 105 world famous generals will participate in this war with you. Player can instruct any officer and his troop in battlefield to battle freely. 3 levels of tutorial can ensure your quick learning of game basics. ##Feature## -Campaign Mode- Pacific War Axis Powers（1941.7 - 1945.1） Allied Forces（1942.5 - 1945.10） Far Eastern War Axis Powers（1937.7 - 1941.12） Allied Forces（1937.8- 1945.8） Korean War WTO（1950.1 - 1953.1） NATO（1950.1 - 1953.4） Middle East War WTO（1955.7 - ???） NATO（1955.9 - ???） -35 Legion Mode campaigns -105 world class generals participated -146 military units available -37 countries involved in the war -36 tactical instructions -16 military ranks, 4 general assistants. -Over 300 real terrains. -Upgrade 6 military facilities in the headquarters -Map Zoom In/Out -Auto save function ...

description: Remember "Wizard of Wor"? Does the name bring back the good memories? Well, it's back, and it's more stunning then it ever was! "Wizard of War" is remake of the old game classic, bringing back the fight. With beautiful, stunning graphics, multiplayer mode, incredibly simple gameplay and unique features, this game is sure to bring fun to your gaming life. ** Multiple play modes - challenge, campaign ** Unique dungeons ** Beautiful graphics ** Coop or player-vs-player mode (soon) ** Optimized engine ** Change controller type (Accelerometer, Joystick) For those familiar with the original, tune in to the story and beat all the monsters in the dungeon. For those **NEW** to the whole story, please read the below hints: * Goal is to clear the dungeon of all the monsters * After each type of monsters is killed an advanced one will come, until fly-like creep appears. Kill it to trigger double score dungeon. * Prevent the fly from escaping the dungeon * Wizard will appear on certain dungeons... Beat him, or be beaten! Be sure to remember: * You can fire only one bullet at a time. Be careful when and what you shoot at * * Some creeps have special abilities * * You **CAN** kill the other Warrior! * * Team play usually pays off * * You have limited lives *

Are you in shape? Fitness Check Up is the app you need to do a fun and enjoyable check-up! The Fitness Checkup application helps you assess your physical shape using 11 health tests: Flexibility, Balance, Body Core, Strength, Capacity for effort, Muscle Tone, Explosiveness, Pulse at rest, Body mass index, Body fat index and Reaction speed. With these 11 tests, your health score can be restored. It comes with advice and exercises to improve your health to where it should be! This is a preventive health approach, so check your health parameters regularly and do our exercises to improve your physical shape. Earn rewards and share with your friends. Characteristics of the Fitness Checkup application: - 11 simple and useful health tests (flexibility, balance, abs) - Clear images and concise explanations to help you do the tests - Personalized advice to help you obtain your health assessment - Exercises to improve your physical shape - Records of your results to help you follow your progress everyday - Overview Fitness Checkup to know your health score - Health rewards to motivate you and help you progress - Webcam pulse measurement for the Cardio and Effort tests! - Share your scores and rewards - Manage your health profile The Cardio and Effort tests of the Fitness Checkup application measure your heart rate thanks to an innovative process using your Smartphone camera as a heart rate monitor! For these 2 tests, you will see your real-time heart rhythm displayed! The application works with telephones possessing a flash. We keep improving our applications all the time. Do not hesitate to contact us! Your opinions interest us. Wake it Up, Shake it Up !

Over 3 MILLION ANGRY MONKEY LOVERS OF THIS EPIC GAME!!!! Although the game has limited playing space to avoid angry monkey but skill required to play this game is not that hard. A thrilling ride through jungle, beach and mountains. Play as Kong? No! Play as Banana STORY: You were hungry and you took a banana. The banana turns out to be a monkey's possession and now he is an ANGRY MONKEY! Unlike fruit ninja where you destroy the fruits, in angry monkey you have to hold onto the banana. The story is pretty similar to egg stealing story of Angry Birds, Angry Birds Rio and Angry Birds Star Wars. Just like Temple Run and Temple Run Brave, you have stolen a prime possession and now have to hold on to it as long as you can. The longer you hold on to it, the higher your score You can also use super powers for banana. There are 5 different star wars style powers. Lets see if you use all of them. A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this never ending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly. LET THE WARS BETWEEN THE TWO STARS (MONKEY and BANANA) COMMENCE!! INSTRUCTIONS: *Dont the let ANGRY monkey snatch the Banana! *TOUCH and SLIDE your banana to move it anywhere! *Watch out for Angry Monkey flying like a bird to get the banana!

description: With Pegasus Airlines' app you can now carry out a number of tasks connected to your flight easily. Our free app means that you can plan your both domestic and international travel easily by booking your flights, checking-in before your flight and using a mobile barcode and also purchasing such ancillary services as inflight meals and seat selection. Features include: BUY TICKETS EASILY Browse destinations and flights, and book your flight tickets with ease. CHOOSE AN INFLIGHT MEAL Purchase an inflight meal from our wide menu options and get served before everybody else. KEEP TRACK OF FLIGHT STATUS Keep tabs on the departure and arrival time of the flights two days in advance. Random Generator is an application that allows you to generate random numbers. The program allows you to select the minimum and maximum range and number of generated numbers. Has an option to generate unique (unduplicated) numbers. Great for getting lottery numbers and using in board games (Monopoly,Backgammon and others) as a dice. For generation random nubmer you can choise a. A Linear Congruential Generator b. Lagged Fibonacci generator c. KISS generator d. ANSI X9.17 generator

N.B: To avoid confusion, please note that now you can chose your own cover photo or take a picture and use as cover photo. To have the option, long click on the existing cover photo in "My Library" With My Library Manager, you can track and manage your book collection in your personal or official library. You can make a detail listing of your book collection with 25 different information to save. You can also rate your books from your personal liking. You will have the ability to track the book you loaned to somebody. With this App, you can further search books in Google Book and see the details and public rating. There is option to add books to your library directly from your search result. Also with a single click, you can find all the existing books similar to what you have. One of the most important feature is the ability to share your library catalog online. If you are running a school or any kind of public library, you can always manage your book with this app and share this to any web server. Any of your member then can import the catalog with a single click if you give them access. In this way, all your members will have updated library catalog in their own App. The members App will not have any interference with your master catalog. Once shared, you can track your library online in http://optanonline.com/mylibman/ You can directly scan Bar/QR code and the APP will get you detail information about the book. You can add that in your library or edit any existing book info just by scanning. You can scan directly from Add Entry or Edit Entry section, but sometimes there are multiple books in Google Books with same ISBN. Hence the recommended way is to scan from Search Book section which will list all the matched books and you can select which one to add to your catalog. The major features include: - Upload your own book cover or get it online - Add/remove books in your reading list, track reading progress. - Track loaned book from Loaned book list - Add books in wishlist or favorite list - Ability to directly add/edit/search books by scanning bar/QR code - Share book catalog over internet to the target community - Touch function to swipe through books - UTF-8 encoding to allow you to work with non-English books - Search book in Google Books, add/edit your library directly from Google book search result - Import/Export functionality from web or internal/external memory - Detail view and list view - Download book information from Google - Download book cover automatically against ISBN
release_text: Major update with first point release (4.x) - Ability to upload your own book cover (long tap on cover image to have option) - New feature - Reading list, Favorite list, Wishlist and Loan list - Automatic cover download is made optional - One click data backup in our server It is always advisable to backup your data before first point upgrade. 4.3 Upgrade: - Mainly bug fix - Minor feature addition Recommended for all 4.x users to upgrade.

description: Спартак+ Sports.ru – лучшее приложение для поклонников футбольного клуба Спартак. Результаты и календарь матчей, текстовые трансляции, новости и видео - все о вашей любимой команде, оперативно и подробно. Следить за Спартаком еще никогда не было настолько удобно. Что вы получите #прямосейчас: • Новости, тексты и интервью о Спартаке; • Онлайн-трансляции матчей, составы команд; • Статистику турнира и игроков; • Календарь и расписание матчей; • Блоги пользователей и статьи; • Фото и видео; • Форумы, чаты и комментарии для общения с другими болельщиками. Не пропустите ни одной новости о Романе Широкове, Артеме Дзюбе, Дмитрии Комбарове и других звездах Спартака! Spartak + Sports.ru - best app for fans of FC Spartak. Results and calendar of matches, text translation, news and videos - all about your favorite team, promptly and in detail. Monitor Spartacus has never been so convenient. What do you get # pryamoseychas: • News, texts and interviews about Spartacus; • Live broadcasts of matches, recaps; • Statistics of the tournament and players; • Calendar and schedule; • User blogs and articles; • Photo and video; • Forums, chat and comments to interact with other fans. Do not miss any news about Roman Shirokov, Artem Dziuba, Dmitry Kombarova and other stars of Spartacus!

developer: Media Applications Technologies for the BBC
description: - Listen live to all BBC Radio stations - Browse hundreds of on-demand programmes - Download podcasts to listen on the go - Discover new music with Playlister - Amazing audio quality over WiFi or 3G/4G - Radio alarm - wake up with live radio - Video and audio clips, including many live performances - Schedules that go backwards by 7 days for easy catch-up - Set reminders for future shows - Connect to Bluetooth audio devices - Share programmes and tracks with your friends Please note: Streaming radio is a data-intensive service. The BBC does not charge for mobile content, but your operator's charges for using the internet over mobile networks may apply, and may be significantly increased whilst roaming outside of the UK. Connecting via WiFi is recommended where possible. Known Issues: - Due to a firmware issue with some Samsung devices (including the Galaxy S4) specifically those running 4.4.2 Touchwiz version of Android, any kind of ‘seeking’ within the audio is currently failing. When you stop listening, the app remembers the position and then tries to seek back to that position when you resume playback (which also happens if connectivity is briefly lost). Because of this firmware fault, this currently fails and playback begins from the start of the programme. Samsung have confirmed that the problem is rectified in a forthcoming patch release which should be rolled out to end users soon. NB: Devices running alternative firmware or custom roms should not be affected - Some Samsung Galaxy users (using 4.1.2 Touchwiz) may find that audio playback does not work for them for live or on-demand programmes. A firmware fix has been deployed by Samsung but may take some time to be rolled out across all networks. Please check for software updates if you have problems using the app. Podcast and video playback should not be affected. - On demand/catchup programmes from local and regional stations are not yet available - Video clips are not currently available for Intel-based devices, such as the Motorola Razr-i, or Orange San Diego
release_text: This release improves the usability of notifications on Android Lollipop. We value your feedback and if you wish to get in touch with us, please do so by email (radiofeedback@bbc.co.uk) or via our Twitter account (@BBCiPlayerRadio)

description: ミニチュア風に写真が撮れるカメラアプリ。 風景写真向きです。 画面にタッチすると、写真を撮って、変換が始まります。 変換画像が表示されると、保存するかしないか選べます。 本体Menuボタンか、画面のMenuをタッチすると、保存サイズを選べます。 大きくしすぎると、強制終了になる可能性がありますので、その場合は、保存サイズを少し下げてください。 保存先は、SDカード(一部機種では本体)に、「CameraEdit」という名前のフォルダが作成され、その中に保存されます。 なお、このアプリは、画像編集・合成アプリ「PhotoMix」の機能の一部を使用して、加工を行っています。 ストレージ権限は、SDカードへの保存に利用しています。 ネット権限は、バナー表示にのみ利用しています。 Camera app that take pictures in miniature style. Is landscape photography orientation. When you touch the screen, you can take a photo, conversion starts. When the conversion image is displayed, you can choose to whether or not to save. Body Menu button, or when you touch the Menu screen, you can choose to save size. If it is too large, because there is likely to be killed, in that case, please slightly reduce the storage size. Save destination, the SD card (body in some models), a folder named "CameraEdit" is created and stored in it. In addition, this app, you can use some of the features of image editing and synthesis application "PhotoMix", we are processing. Storage rights, you have to use to save to the SD card. Net authority, only I'm using the banner display.
release_text: ver 1.20 保存されている画像も変換できるようになりました。 共有ボタン追加。 変換処理速度の向上。 デザイン変更。

description: This application is 25 multiple choice questions in the area of Dermatology. The questions give a photograph of a Dermatologic Condition and then ask a question about it. This application is designed for medical students, physician assistants, and nurse practitioners preparing for the boards.

Try our latest app to show you the quickest MRT route - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.roarapps.singaporemrt ONLY app with ALL Singapore traffic cameras! Check the latest traffic condition of Singapore major highway and causeway! Traffic web cams for commuters in Singapore. Ready to head home and you want to check the traffic? Live Traffic Singapore is the fastest way to get to the traffic web cams that matter to you. Instead of browsing to a web site and working your way through the menus and map graphics to find a web camera just open Live Traffic Singapore on your android and go straight to the camera you want with one click. Navigate through the other cameras along your route, in order, with a simple Next button. Should I stay or should I go? The traffic is slowing to a crawl. Is it going to clear quickly or is it time to bail and find a better route? Open Live Traffic Singapore, select the nearest camera with one click and then navigate through the web cams along your route to see how far the congestion continues. Cameras are maintained by LTA Singapore. Individual cameras may be inoperative due to weather conditions or maintenance requirements.
release_text: The ad free version will be slightly quicker and helps support our development :) Please also try our Singapore MRT app - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.roarapps.singaporemrt v1.4.0 Added Marina Coastal Expressway (MCE) cameras Improved image retrieval code v1.32 Added Keppel Viaduct Camera v.1.31 -Camera image timestamp added back to app

description: Cool cats – are you ready to jam with the grooviest band in town? Meet the BEBOPS, a colourful, crazy bunch of musicians who are all set to put on an amazing concert but need your help holding the auditions. With BEBOPS you can make unique tunes that will stick in your head - and create your own band! - 20 free musicians, each with their own unique sounds and moves; - 130 characters that you can unlock if you love the app; - 10 different BEBOPS musical styles available: New jazz / Animals / Fantasy / Monsters / Rock / Robots / Cavemen / Samba / Hip Hop / Reggae. More to come!; - Change the way characters play by tapping them - three different rhythms for each character; - Adjust volumes easily by tapping on the performers; - Incredible, original graphics and animations; - Children friendly interface - easy and simple to use, allows kids to use BEBOPS by themselves; The BEBOPS live in a magical land where they just want to have fun. They are getting together for a big concert and need your help to choose who is going to play on stage. With over 150 musicians - each with 3 rhythmic variations - you can have endless combinations and create all sorts of addictive tunes! Either you want to be a rockstar or you're in love with the classics, BEBOPS allows you to try all the styles you know, discover some more, and mix them up! Reggae Kings and Queens, hip hop fanatics from all over the world, be ready for the stage! For the kids, BEBOPS features some of the classic fairy tales characters - Snow White, charming princes, the Puss in Boots... - robots or animals, singing and performing just for them! BEBOPS children friendly interface makes it the perfect app for families and friends, no matter how young - or old - you are. Guitars, drums, voice performers (both girls and boys, solo performers or chorus), trumpets, pianos, flutes, djs... and much more are available for you to mix and create. Some characters even use their bodies to create original sounds - it's so much fun! We take privacy seriously. The BEBOPS app: - Does NOT contain ads; - Does NOT share any information with third party; - Does NOT collect or store personal information. Email us: info@lisbonlabs.com Like us: http://www.facebook.com/lisbonlabs
